title: Ride for the Record
description: Skate électrique : record du monde – Electric skateboard world record & documentary
allParagraphs: Skate électrique : record du monde – Electric skateboard world record & documentary
Un skateboard électrique. Un rêve fou. Un film. Et un record du monde à décrocher.
Je m'appelle Anaël Lecomte, menuisier de métier et passionné de glisse et de mécanique.

Il y a un an, j’ai commencé à construire dans mon atelier un skate électrique pas comme les autres. Une machine née de passion, de bricolage de haut vol, de nuits blanches et de tests à couper le souffle.

132 km/h. C’est la vitesse que j’ai déjà atteinte sur circuit.
Mais l’objectif est clair : aller plus loin, plus vite. Et inscrire ce record dans l’histoire.

Le rêve ?
Un record du monde de vitesse sur un skateboard électrique, validé par le Guinness (le record actuel est de 132km/h).
Et un film captivant qui raconte toute l’épopée, de l’établi jusqu’à la ligne d’arrivée.
Votre contribution servira à :
Et vous, vous recevez :
Ce projet, c’est :
C’est aussi un film inspirant que nous voulons montrer en festivals, sur plateformes vidéo, et partager à tous ceux qui veulent croire que tout est possible.

Oui, il y a des risques. Le matériel doit être ultra-précis. La sécurité est une priorité. La logistique est exigeante.
Mais l’équipe est prête. Les premiers essais sont là. Et la motivation est totale.
? Partagez cette campagne avec vos amis, vos communautés, vos médias préférés
? Parlez-en à des sponsors, influenceurs, passionnés de glisse, tech ou ciné
? Écrivez-nous si vous avez des idées, du matos, des compétences ou des likes à offrir
? Suivez nous sur les réseaux : @inst_anael ; yt : Lecomte Anaël

Ce projet, c’est une explosion d’adrénaline, une aventure humaine et technique, et un film qui vous embarque.
Rejoignez-moi. On va faire parler de ce skate dans le monde entier.

title: WooshX: The Toiletry Bag That Travels Smarter.
description: 180° Lay-Flat | Magnetic Smart | Multi-Zone Pack | Waterproof Pocket | 3 Sizes & 3 Colours
allParagraphs: 180° Lay-Flat | Magnetic Smart | Multi-Zone Pack | Waterproof Pocket | 3 Sizes & 3 Colours
Packing for a trip always feels like a challenge, doesn't it? Too many essentials, not enough space—and somehow, your toothbrush always ends up buried at the bottom. That's where WooshX comes in.

This isn't just a toiletry bag—it's a travel essential. Designed for maximum capacity, effortless organization, and smart accessibility, it keeps everything neatly in place with a three-zone layout and a magnetic smart system for quick, hassle-free access. With its 180-degree lay-flat design, finding what you need has never been easier.
No more digging, no more mess—just a smarter, more intuitive way to pack.

Ever struggled to decide which products make the cut for your trip? With WooshX, you don't have to. Designed to fit more while keeping everything organized, this bag ensures your essentials always have a place—without the overstuffed mess.

From your go-to skincare and grooming tools to travel must-haves, there's room for everything you need. With three sizes to choose from—Trail (Small) for quick getaways, Journey (Medium) for longer trips, and Expedition (Large) for when you need to bring it all—WooshX adapts to your packing style, ensuring you never have to leave anything behind.

If you've ever groaned while fishing for your toothbrush buried in a chaotic toiletry bag, WooshX is your solution. Its clever three-zone layout makes packing and organizing effortless, ensuring everything has its place.

With a spacious compartment for bulky essentials, smart pockets for smaller items, and a detachable magnetic shower board, WooshX keeps your toiletries neatly arranged and easy to access. An intuitive design means no more spills, no more frantic digging—just stress-free packing, every time.

Have you ever tried to grab something from a toiletry bag, only to end up pulling everything out by mistake? WooshX solves this with its 180-degree lay-flat design. When fully unzipped, it opens like a book or a mini shelf, giving you a clear view of all your essentials at a glance.

Whether you're breezing through airport security or settling into your hotel bathroom, you'll love how easy it is to find and access everything. This Full-Access design transforms how you interact with your toiletries—keeping everything right at your fingertips.

WooshX's magnetic system makes packing effortless, with snap-shut buttons for quick, secure access and a detachable magnetic shower board that keeps your shower essentials neatly in place. Easily attach or remove it for instant access, making your routine smoother than ever.
No more stuck zippers or messy counters—just seamless access, smarter organization, and stress-free travel.

The new WooshX is designed to match your travel needs perfectly. Whether you're packing light or bringing it all, there's a size for every adventure: Trail (Small) for quick getaways, Journey (Medium) for longer trips, and Expedition (Large) for maximum capacity.
With three sleek colour options, WooshX keeps you organized and stylish wherever you go.

Made with waterproof fabric, WooshX is built to handle bathrooms, spills, and wet environments with ease. Water rolls off instantly, keeping the bag dry and looking as good as new—so you never have to worry about moisture ruining your essentials.

title: CloudWater:Make Pure&healthy Water FromThe Air
description: 7-Layer Filtration|80L/day|48 Cycles/Day Water Circulation|4-In-1Functionlity|Enjoy Anywhere
allParagraphs: 7-Layer Filtration|80L/day|48 Cycles/Day Water Circulation|4-In-1Functionlity|Enjoy Anywhere

Your body relies on water to thrive—it fuels cells, cleanses blood, delivers nutrients, replenishes minerals, and protects joints. Now, imagine creating this vital resource effortlessly, straight from the air around you. Pure hydration, on demand.

Water is the source of life, yet it faces severe challenges. Research shows that plastic components have been detected in water bodies around the world, and the World Resources Institute predicts that by 2030, 25% of the global population will face a water scarcity crisis.

CloudWater uses technological innovation as its engine, continuously working to solve global water supply problems, aiming to help more households and businesses overcome the dual challenges of water scarcity and pollution.

CloudWater is an atmospheric water generator that extracts and purifies water from air using advanced H2O conversion and PFS systems. It efficiently extracts moisture from the air and purifies it into safe, healthy drinking water. With no installation required, it is easy to use, eco-  friendly, and suitable for various scenarios.

The CloudWater series includes various models that operate stably in non-standard temperature and humidity conditions across over 200 countries, continuously producing clean drinking water for diverse needs.

CloudWater utilizes advanced atmospheric extraction technology to harvest moisture from the air. Our intelligent system adjusts water quality to a stable pH of 7.8, producing fresh, pure, slightly alkaline water.

This water not only tastes smooth but also helps:
✔ Maintain optimal pH balance
✔ Replenish hydration & electrolytes faster
✔ Provide ideal daily drinking water
Wherever you are, experience the vitality of premium water - on demand.

Certified by authoritative water quality testing agencies, CloudWater produces pure drinking water that exceeds national standards with 0 pollution, 0 additives, and 0 heavy metals, surpassing both surface and groundwater quality.

CloudWater uses the PFS purification system with seven layers of filtration to ensure water quality from source to endpoint. Air is first filtered to remove contaminants, ensuring clean water sourcing. Then, water undergoes four-stage purification to eliminate impurities, absorb harmful substances, and kill 99.9% of microorganisms, providing pure, drinkable water.
Suspended Particles in Water (＞0.1μm) - visible contaminants including sediment, microorganisms, and organic matter - directly affect water turbidity and odor.

CloudWater's Military-Grade UF Membrane (0.01μm pores) removes:
✓ 99.9% bacteria (e.g. E.coli, 1-5μm)
✓ Most viruses (e.g. Norovirus, 0.02-0.3μm)
✓ Heavy metal ions (Pb, Hg, etc.)

Triple Protection from Air to Glass:
1️⃣ Air Stage: 3-layer filtration removes PM2.5/VOCs
2️⃣ Water Stage: UF membrane + activated carbon purification
3️⃣ Delivery Stage: UV sterilization in real-time
Producing WHO-compliant drinking water with crisp, fresh taste.
CloudWater can produce up to 80L (21 gallons) of pure drinking water daily, equivalent to 160 bottles of 500mL mineral water, easily meeting the daily drinking needs of about 40 adults.

CloudWater Featuring 48 automated daily purification cycles, the system actively eliminates bacteria and impurities while preventing water stagnation. The integrated AWS technology injects kinetic energy into water molecules through high-frequency vortex, maintaining optimal molecular structure to ensure every drop stays fresh, safe, and ready-to-drink—anytime, anywhere.
CloudWater produces 4 liters of pure drinking water for only $0.15.

Much cheaper than bottled water ($8) or water bottles ($1.5). No more paying extra, dealing with plastic waste, or facing water shortages. Simply get fresh water from the air and have it available whenever and wherever you need it.
*Based on avg. U.S. electricity rate ($0.15/kWh) and 4L water output per kWh.
CloudWater produces 3–5L of drinking water per kWh, maximizing energy efficiency. Even with long operation, its low energy consumption cuts costs and reduces environmental impact.
CloudWater incorporates a solar power system, enabling continuous operation without reliance on external power, enhancing both convenience and sustainability.

Addressing the global crisis of freshwater depletion, CloudWater has pioneered an innovative technological strategy, successfully developing China's first " Air-to-Water Generator." This breakthrough provides safe and healthy drinking water solutions for water-scarce and heavily polluted regions, while also delivering an eco-friendly, energy-efficient, and high-quality water alternative for urban areas.

Since entering the air-to-water industry in 2006, CloudWater has dedicated itself to the R&D, manufacturing, and sales of air-based water generation systems. Collaborating with leading institutions such as Guangdong University of Technology, CloudWater established the "Air Water Joint Laboratory" to drive innovation in the sector, fostering synergy between academia and industry.

"Technology harmonizes life; innovation brightens the world." Staying true to its mission, CloudWater continues to advance air-to-water technology through multidimensional partnerships with universities and research institutes, steering the global drinking water industry toward sustainable and healthy development.

To bring this vision to life, CloudWater donates equipment to remote islands and water-scarce areas, particularly to small schools, ensuring access to safe drinking water for children and supporting their growth.
Beyond innovation, CloudWater’s actions create a lasting positive impact, fulfilling its mission to benefit humanity and promote sustainable water use and environmental protection.

title: Density Cubes 2.0: Same weight, different sizes.
description: Experience the densities of 11 elemental metals with these precision machined cubes.
allParagraphs: Experience the densities of 11 elemental metals with these precision machined cubes.

Density Cubes was first launched on Kickstarter in 2020. The idea was to create a fascinating, interactive representation of the densities of metal elements. We introduced 5 different pure metal elements, each precisely cut to different sizes so every cube weighs exactly the same.
The Complete Density Cube Collection + Silver Add-On

We are now back with Density Cubes 2.0, a new set of metals that allow you to begin or extend your collection, plus a stunning silver add-on cube. The original Density Cubes 1.0set is also available, so you can either choose your favourite set or purchase the complete collection.
Choose from the following set options:
1 x tungsten cube
1 x copper cube
1 x iron cube
1 x titanium cube
1 x aluminum cube
1 x display base: sleek acrylic or upgrade to American Black Walnut in the add-on section.
Density Cubes 1.0
1 x  Zirconium cube
1 x  Zinc cube
1 x  Tin cube
1 x  Nickel cube
1 x  Bismuth cube
1 x Display base: stick with the sleek acrylic base, or choose an American Black Walnut base as an 'add-on'.
Density Cubes 2.0
Density Cube Set 1.0 + Density Cube Set 2.0
Save £6 when purchasing both sets!
Density Cubes 1.0:
1 x  Tungsten cube
1 x  Copper cube
1 x  Iron cube
1 x  Titanium cube
1 x  Aluminum cube
Density Cube 2.0:
1 x  Zirconium cube
1 x  Zinc cube
1 x  Tin cube
1 x  Nickel cube
1 x  Bismuth cube
2 x Display bases: stick with the double layer sleek acrylic bases, or choose 2 American Black Walnut bases as an 'add-on'.
Density Cubes 1.0 and 2.0 on the standard double layer sleek acrylic display base

The American Black Walnut Base is handcrafted in the UK by a talented woodworker and adds some real gravity to your Density Cubes set(s). To upgrade to the American Black Walnut Base(s), select from the add-on options during checkout.
You will need to add two bases if you have pledged for the complete 10 piece set.
American Black Walnut Base Add-on

The silver cube is the second densest cube after tungsten, with a density of 10.49 g/cm³ and a volume of 1.84cm³. Silver is a precious, lustrous transition metal, with a brilliant white colour that makes it stands out. We have chosen to make the silver cube an optional add-on rather than including it within one of the Density Cubes sets in order to ensure both of the standard sets remain affordable. Made from 99.9% pure silver, the silver cube will certainly be the crowning jewel of your Density Cubes collection. To add a solid silver cube to your set(s), select from the add-on options during checkout.
Silver Add-On Density Cube

The original Density Cubes were chosen due to the striking variety between cubes, in terms of density, colour and properties. The newest cubes, zirconium, zinc, tin, nickel and bismuth, are intriguing and varied elements which can either combine with the original Density Cubes set, or exist as a stand-alone set. For instance, zinc is used to coat other metals as an anti-corrosion agent, while bismuth forms rainbow-coloured crystals on its surface upon oxidisation. The solid silver add-on cube was chosen due to its reputation as an extremely precious metal, and the fact that it’s the whitest and most reflective of the precious metals.
Density Cubes are:
The zirconium cube, part of the Density Cubes 2.0 set

I created the original Density Cubes set in early 2020 during the beginning of the coronavirus pandemic. The project was a great success and I received numerous requests for an extended version of the collection.
Have a look at some of the feedback the original Density Cubes set received:
An array of elements from the Density Cubes 2.0 set
KEEPING YOUR COLLECTION SPARKLING

Copper and Iron are naturally prone to slight oxidisation which can make their original colour change to form a patina, while zinc can lose its shine over a long period of time. Here are the best ways to maintain the original condition of your Density Cubes:
Iron: simply keep it as dry as possible.
Copper: clean it by mixing lemon juice or vinegar with a little salt and rubbing it over the surfaces.
Zinc: occasionally lightly oil or wax the surfaces to avoid it's shine eventully becoming dull.
QUALITY CONTROL

Each cube has been precision-cut from the highest purity metals available and laser engraved with its unique periodic symbol, atomic number and name. Every cube is then hand weighed to ensure it fits within a tight tolerance of less than 1% variation* between cubes!
*Variation is due to letter etching and the sanding of corners/edges to make the cubes safe to touch.
Risks and challenges

I do not see any unconquerable challenges arising with the delivery of my project. Density Cubes has been fully prototyped, and I have the capacity to produce the sets in copious volumes if required. But of course with any new project like this, there is a small chance of unanticipated delay, perhaps due to a late shipment arrival or items failing my quality testing and needing to therefore be replaced. In order to hedge and overcome these risks I have accounted for the addition of multiple weeks into the delivery date. I am 100% ready to bring Density Cubes to market, so you too can have a piece of science on your desk. My ultimate goal is to respond promptly to communications and to deliver a great product exactly as you would expect from your pledge.

title: Hemp-based towel better for people and the planet
description: Ultra absorbent, quick drying, exfoliating bath towels made from hemp and organic cotton.
allParagraphs: Ultra absorbent, quick drying, exfoliating bath towels made from hemp and organic cotton.
Quick drying: proprietary weave that dries you off faster
Ultra-absorbent: terry texture that wicks away water from your skin
High quality: hemp fibers get stronger the more that you use them, creating a towel that lasts longer.
Towel feel: custom composition of 55% hemp blended with 45% organic cotton achieves a soft yet exfoliating experience

The average person uses a towel at least 10x a day and the average towel is made from conventional cotton, which means farmers might be using genetically modified seeds requiring usage of toxic chemicals such as insecticides and pesticides to grow the cotton in large quantities.  After the cotton is harvested, it is then spun into yarn and often dyed with harmful chemicals, which can spillover into waterways and the land. This common process creates a negative impact on people and the planet. In addition, towels made from this process are often lacking in absorbency, durability, quality and performance.
We seek to disrupt this process and provide a superior product.

When I first developed the Anact towel - I developed it because there wasn't a towel that fit my needs on the market.  A towel that was absorbent, fast drying, exfoliating, and sustainable.  A towel that used hemp for its natural performance features of being biostatic, which is short for inhibiting the growth of other microorganisms.
A towel that has an opportunity to make a difference for all people and the planet.

The Anact towels have been 2+ years in the making and today, I get to invite you to purchase your own one- of-a-kind Anact towels.  We are paving the way of re-introducing hemp as a preferred fiber in textiles and you won't be able to find a towel like ours anywhere else on the market.  The Anact towel is made from 55% hemp and 45% organic cotton.
Hemp is one of the most sustainable fibers that is being reintroduced back into society.

For those of you saying, what about bamboo?  The truth is that bamboo's is rayon. If you were to test your bamboo towels, there would be little to no bamboo present in the towel.  This is due to a textile process that takes the bamboo and melts it down to a smooth gel-like liquid state (very much like super glue) using chemicals such as Sodium Hydroxide & Carbon Di-sulfate which are both considered harmful to the environment by some researchers.  From here, the liquid is channeled through incredibly fine holes straight into a bath of water that instantly cools it solid. This incredibly thin fiber is then rolled into spools to be later twisted with additional fibers to produce thread & yarns which can then be used in the making of the fabric we make our clothes out of and unfortunately, has no bamboo left in the product, which is one more reason why we are advocating for transparency around the process and using hemp as a preferred fiber.
HEMP
By purchasing the Anact bath towel you save 526 days of drinking water!

My name is Brianna Kilcullen. I created Anact because of my experiences working in sourcing and sustainability at Under Armour and prAna, a subsidiary of Columbia Sportswear.  After traveling to 40+ countries and working in farms and factories on five continents - I gained a rare perspective of the textile industry and its impact on people and the planet.  So much so that I couldn't sit on the sidelines any longer - I had to do something about it.

Anact is short for "an act". The simple act of creating impact.  My simple act was to create a hemp-based towel that is better for all people and the planet.  This is just the beginning. We are creating a movement to take simple acts each day whether it be using the Anact towel or picking up a piece of trash on the street to create impact.

What I mean by ALL people is that I wanted to share the story of the farmers who harvest your hemp and cotton, the textile workers who process these fibers into your future Anact towel (you like what I did there?) and the end customer - YOU.  I believe that now, more than ever, we have the opportunity to connect with one another to take simple acts to create impact.
If you would like to add additional products to your pledge, simply make another purchase.  You can't add more than one product in an order, but you can make multiple orders using the same account.

Wholesale pricing is available.  Please contact me at hello@anact.com with the quantity, the product type (wash towel, hand towel, bath towel, towel set, tote bag). *Please note that we can do custom screen printing on the tote bag and we can do co-branded product on the towel label.
All profits will be reinvested back into the business so we can provide more access to Anact towel(s) to people who want to make an impact.

I’m working with experienced supply chain professionals to ensure that we all get high quality product in a timely manner. We've built in buffers to account for any surprises, but rest assured that you’re in great hands.
Simple acts of impact.  That's what we're all about.  Invite your family and friends to upgrade their towels by sharing a post and tagging us @anactglobal and using the hashtags #anact #anactglobal.

As the world becomes increasingly mobile, space-saving solutions are becoming more and more important, particularly in urban areas where living space is at a premium. Foldable furniture is a great way to maximize space while still having all the necessary pieces to live comfortably. Here are 4 key design goals that are essential for high-quality foldable furniture:

A good foldable furniture design should be able to support a high payload while still being lightweight and easy to move around. Our foldable furniture’s 1kg aviation aluminum frame is designed to support more than 110kg while weighing just 1.3kg(2.8lbs) gross weight, making it easy to move around and set up wherever you need it.

One of the most important benefits of foldable furniture is the space it saves when not in use. Our foldable furniture saves up to 98% of its volume when fully folded and retrieved, making it easy to hold in hand, store in small spaces like closets or under the bed.

Quick and easy deployment is a must-have feature for foldable furniture. Our furniture can be set up in just 5 seconds and retrieved in half a minute, making it perfect for impromptu gatherings or temporary seating solutions.
Instant Depoly, Landing wherever you go

The comfort and ergonomics of foldable furniture are just as important as their space-saving features. Our furniture is designed to optimize lower seating positions, with 10° adjustments in all directions for maximum comfort.
Maybe for Meozart as well (our studio cat, one of the super early users lol)

With these four design goals in mind, our foldable furniture is the perfect solution for those who value flexibility, portability, and ease of use. Whether you're looking for extra seating for guests, a portable workspace, or just a place to sit and relax, our foldable furniture has got you covered.

When it comes to choosing materials for furniture production, there are three key principles to consider: functionality, aesthetics, and sustainability. By following these principles, furniture manufacturers can create high-quality, functional, and aesthetically pleasing products that are also eco-friendly and sustainable. Let's take a closer look at each of these principles:
Now, let's take a look at some specific materials that are great choices based on these principles:
Finally, when it comes to craftsmanship and finishing, attention to detail is key:

In summary, when choosing materials for furniture production, it's important to consider functionality, aesthetics, and sustainability. By selecting materials based on these principles and paying attention to craftsmanship and finishing details, we can create high-quality, functional, and aesthetically pleasing furniture that is also eco-friendly and sustainable.

As a product designer, I am constantly seeking inspiration from different sources to create innovative and functional designs. Two sources of inspiration that have influenced my work are the design of the Lunar Lander and the art of Origami.

Since the Soviet Union launched the first artificial Earth satellite Sputnik 1 (Спутник-1) on 4 October 1957, we have entered the new era - space age.  Another historical milestone, the design of the Lunar Lander, which was used by NASA for the Apollo moon landing mission, is another source of inspiration for me. The Lunar Lander was designed to be lightweight, compact, and highly functional, with the ability to fold up and fit into a small space. This design feature has inspired me to think about how I can create products that are not only functional but also highly portable, space-saving and aesthetic of minimalism.
Image by Cristian Ibarra from Pixabay

The Japanese art of paper folding has been used for centuries to create intricate and beautiful designs using just a single sheet of paper. The technique of folding and unfolding the paper to create various shapes and forms has inspired me to think about how I can use folding as a design element in my products.
This design and organize of fabric element is inspire by one of the most commonly used origami technique:
origami inspiration: optimized fabric deisgn for better fold and extend
Foldable Bag for full-pack or half-pack mode
If you are interested in this topic, highly recommend this book:
Folding Techniques for Designers: From Sheet to Form (How to fold paper and other materials for design projects), by Paul Jackson, ISBN-10 : 1856697215

Combining these two sources of inspiration, I have created the Foldable Lander Chair, a versatile and innovative design that combines the functionality of a chair with the portability of a foldable design. The chair and table/ottoman is made from lightweight materials and can be easily folded and unfolded with the fabric organized in Origami way, making it ideal for use in small spaces or for outdoor activities.

Evolution of fabric design, special thanks to Yingyiing's volunteer testing (another studio cat).

title: SwitchX - Transformable Titanium Flashlight Pen
description: Pen, Stylus, Bit Driver, Window Breaker, Hex Wrench, Pry Bar, Box Cutter, Nail Puller, Flashlight...
allParagraphs: Pen, Stylus, Bit Driver, Window Breaker, Hex Wrench, Pry Bar, Box Cutter, Nail Puller, Flashlight...
Hey friends,

I’m so excited to share our latest Kickstarter campaign with you! Meet the ultimate Titanium Tactical Pen with Flashlight! We’ve put our heart and soul into this project, and I can’t wait for you to see it.
This isn’t just any pen—it’s crafted entirely from premium GR5 titanium alloy, showcasing exceptional craftsmanship. What makes this pen truly stand out is its incredible versatility and durability.

Imagine having a reliable writing instrument, a powerful flashlight, and a set of versatile tools all in one sleek, compact design. Whether you’re an outdoor enthusiast, a professional, or someone who loves high-quality, multi-functional gadgets, this pen is perfect for you.

The pen's flashlight is super bright, perfect for finding your way in the dark or signaling for help. Plus, it’s designed to be robust and lightweight, and equipped with a convenient pocket clip, so you can carry it anywhere without feeling weighed down. The tools are cleverly integrated, ready to assist in any unexpected situation.

The idea for this pen was born from our own experiences and frustrations. As avid outdoor enthusiasts and professionals who rely heavily on our gear, we found ourselves constantly searching for the perfect tool—something compact, durable, and versatile enough to handle various tasks. Traditional pens and flashlights often fell short of our needs, lacking the durability and multi-functionality we desired.

We envisioned a product that could seamlessly integrate into our everyday carry (EDC) kit while offering unparalleled functionality. After countless brainstorming sessions, sketches, and prototypes, we developed the Titanium Tactical Pen with Flashlight. Our goal was to create a tool that not only meets but exceeds the demands of outdoor adventurers, first responders, and anyone who values preparedness and quality.

Our Titanium Tactical Pen is made from GR5 titanium alloy, known for its incredible strength, lightweight properties, and resistance to rust. The pen undergoes meticulous precision machining to ensure every detail is perfect. The result is a sleek, durable, and stylish pen that can withstand the rigors of daily use and extreme conditions.

The grip section of the pen features meticulously designed anti-slip grooves, ensuring a secure and comfortable hold even in the most challenging conditions. These grooves provide enhanced traction, preventing the pen from slipping out of your hand, whether you're writing in the rain, handling it with gloves, or using it in high-stress situations. This thoughtful design element not only enhances usability but also adds to the overall durability and reliability of the pen, making it an indispensable tool for any scenario.
One of the standout features of our pen is the innovative rotating replaceable pen tip design. Users can choose two out of four different Tips to suit their specific needs:

The eternal pen tip writes smoothly without the need for ink refills, making it ideal for prolonged use and extreme environments.This versatile tool functions as a flat pry bar and screwdriver, perfect for minor repairs and adjustments on the go.The capacitive stylus tip allows you to navigate touch screens with ease, ensuring precision and convenience when using your devices.Equipped with a tungsten steel tip, this tip is designed to break glass in emergency situations, providing you with a reliable tool for rescue operations.

The rear part of the pen features a magnetic flashlight that can rotate 360 degrees, allowing you to adjust the light angle to suit your needs.The flashlight can be easily detached and attached to any metal surface, providing hands-free lighting in various situations. This feature is especially useful for outdoor activities and emergencies.The flashlight offers three light modes: low, medium, and high. You can easily switch between modes to get the perfect amount of light for any situation.In addition to the regular light modes, the flashlight also features a red and blue strobe mode for emergency signaling.This flashlight features a USB Type-C port for fast and easy charging via a computer or power bank. Charging times range from 35 to 60 minutes, depending on the charger used—fully charged in 35 minutes with a 34W/5V/2.4A charger or 60 minutes with a 5W/5V/1A charger. A red/green LED indicator lets you know if it's charging or fully charged.The flashlight is equipped with an intuitive button, making it easy to operate and switch between light modes.

The pen's side features two sizes of bit drivers (1/4 inch and 1/6 inch), making it easy to handle repairs on the go. This tool is perfect for tightening screws and performing minor fixes.A built-in hex wrench provides additional functionality, allowing you to handle a variety of tasks with ease.

We offer the flashlight pen in two stunning color options: natural sandblasted titanium and sleek black. Each color brings its own unique style to the table. The natural titanium finish showcases the raw, industrial beauty of the metal, highlighting its premium quality and ruggedness. The black finish, on the other hand, exudes a modern, sophisticated vibe, perfect for those who prefer a more understated look. Both colors are designed to look fantastic while providing the same high level of performance and durability, so you can choose the one that best fits your personal style.We offer various reward tiers to suit different backer preferences. From launch day specials to exclusive limited editions, there's something for everyone. Check out our reward tiers and choose the one that best fits your needs.

Join us in bringing this exceptional Titanium Tactical Pen with Flashlight to life. Your support will help us move into production and deliver this versatile, high-quality tool to users around the world. Thank you for backing our project!

title: Apex 300
description: Start Simple,Scale Smart - 120V/240V for Heavy-duty| 3,840W Output | 30kW max. Solar Input
allParagraphs: Start Simple,Scale Smart - 120V/240V for Heavy-duty| 3,840W Output | 30kW max. Solar Input

The BLUETTI Apex 300 is a versatile all-in-one power station with 120V and 240V outputs, offering unmatched flexibility and affordability. Start with a cost-effective single unit for essential backup, and seamlessly scale up with smart accessories to power your RV, off-grid life, or keep your home running during outages.

The Apex 300 delivers 2,764.8Wh capacity and 3,840W output (up to 7,680W in Power Lifting Mode), supporting both 120V and 240V appliances—ready to use straight out of the box. With 0ms UPS backup, it ensures uninterrupted power for essential devices during unexpected outages.

As the first energy storage system featuring a 12kW bypass load capability, the Apex 300 integrates seamlessly with the grid and powers high-demand devices, such as EV chargers, without the risk of overloading. In the event of a power outage, the system automatically switches to backup mode, ensuring the continuous operation of critical devices such as routers, refrigerators, and CPAPs.

Thanks to its modular design, the Apex 300 can deliver up to 11.52 kW of power by connecting 2-3 units in parallel, and expand to a massive 58 kWh by adding 1-18 battery packs. You can easily tailor your setup to meet your energy needs during an outage, starting with minimal investment and upgrading in just 5 minutes as your power demands grow.

Designed to flawlessly work with your existing microinverters, generators, and grid-tied solar systems, the Apex 300 becomes the central hub for your home's digital power control—accessible via our intuitive app.
Long-Term Outage Resilience

The system activates your rooftop solar array to charge the Apex 300 during outages. When solar and battery storage fall short, the system is also capable of a "black start" using a 240V generator to keep your home running without interruption.
Intelligent Load Flexibility
During prolonged outages, the system can automatically pause power delivery to high-demand devices—such as EV chargers—to extend your backup time.

Once the Apex 300 detects upcoming severe weather conditions, it automatically charges using the grid and solar in advance, preparing for potential power outages. No manual intervention needed—once the disaster is over, the system returns to its default mode, ensuring continuous power for everyday life.

The Apex 300 is compatible with 120V/240V generators for instant charging. By switching between stored energy and a generator, you'll have extended battery life to power your home in extreme weather, ensuring 24/7 operation for essentials like refrigerators, medical equipment, etc.

Let Apex 300 handle your energy bills with smart peak-load shifting. Simply enable the mode in the app, and it will automatically charge using solar and low-rate grid power, then power your home during peak hours—maximizing savings without lifting a finger.
Maximize your ROI with up to 4,000W solar input and offset your investment in just 2 years. After that, all the money you save is pure profit.

With BLUETTI's self-developed SolarX 4K—the world's first 4,000W PV voltage regulator, you can achieve 4kW-30kW solar input. Integrate this system with existing roof solar setups via AC coupling, ideal for DIY enthusiasts looking for multiple charging solutions.
Note: 30kW solar input is only supported when paired with the AT1 Smart Distribution Panel.

The Apex 300 features 6 AC outputs that can be directly connected to the RV's air conditioner, oven, coffee maker, heater, and more. The Hub D1 can be easily mounted on the Apex 300, saving space and providing versatile options to charge your DC devices.
The NEMA TT-30R* is specifically designed for charging your RV via the shore power port, providing electricity to all large AC appliances in the RV while saving substantially on charging costs.
*Specifically designed for the U.S. version.

Apex 300 paired with the Hub D1 offers an easy DIY solution for full AC+DC power in your RV. With a built-in installation, it covers all your DC power needs and allows simple AC plug-and-play connections for devices like coffee machines and ovens. Enjoy seamless, reliable power on your RV trips.

With up to 3,840W output and 7,680W surge power, the Apex 300 easily runs high-power tools like saws, drills, air compressors, and even devices with high startup power demands. No longer worry about overloading while working in your studio.

Create your off-grid power system by installing the Apex 300 with an outlet box in your cabin. Enjoy the convenience of grid-like power, keeping your AC appliances running smoothly, even off the grid.
With in-house R&D, manufacturing, and supply chain, BLUETTI slashes costs without cutting quality. No fluff, no premium markup—just powerful, entry-level energy at the price you won't sweat.

From wireless magnetic transformer, optimized circuit topology, and software algorithms to upgraded components and custom cables, Apex 300 is engineered for 5× energy efficiency, and extended runtime lasts twice as long.
With a next-gen modular design, Apex 300 packs 40% more energy density than its peers. Whether standalone or parallel setup, it fits anywhere—even your broom closet.

Powered by 2nd-gen automotive-grade LiFePO₄ battery cells, BLUETTI sets the industry benchmark with 6,000+ charge cycles (80% capacity) and up to 17 years of everyday use—2x longer than typical systems.
Unlike others stuck with “either-or,” Apex 300 powers both 120V and 240V devices at the same time—even while charging. No rewiring. No compromises.
Twice the bypass of competitors means no overload worries for high power needs, plug-and-play setup without complex wiring, and a breeze to directly charge heavy-duty loads like EV chargers!

Apex 300 is your energy hub—expand it with 10+ smart accessories as your needs involve. From emergency backup, whole-home energy sufficiency, and RV camping to off-grid living, it adapts to every need, wherever you need it.

No one wants to see a good idea executed poorly, especially us. We have worked extremely hard to ready this product for Indiegogo and full-scale manufacturing and fulfillment, but here are what I see as the risks:
▶ PRODUCT ADJUSTMENTS
As the BLUETTI Apex 300 products get geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced manufacturing partners. These will always benefit you, the consumer, and we will let you know precisely how and why any are made.
▶ FULFILLMENT
Sometimes things go awry that can’t be planned for: maybe a supplier misses a deadline, a machine malfunctions, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks, we will enter the manufacturing stage with at least one backup supplier for each component pre-located. My product commercialization experts will help ensure smooth sailing with our suppliers and factories.

For over a decade, BLUETTI has revolutionized the energy landscape with unmatched innovation. Serving millions of happy customers worldwide, our pioneering portable power stations and solar generators redefine reliable backup power and off-grid living. With a track record of excellence, BLUETTI stands as the trusted choice for adventurers, homeowners, and businesses alike. We’ve delivered over 2 million devices to 100+ countries and regions. And we have a network of over 30 global warehouses, ensuring you’ll get your shipment in time, before summer 2025!

title: The Pro Ears Stealth Elite
description: Hear what you want to hear -- No compromises.
allParagraphs: Hear what you want to hear -- No compromises.

The Stealth Elite is a unique pair of electronic hearing protection earbuds with attachable Bluetooth lanyard. Each set of Stealth Elites come with two earbuds independently powered by a standard #10 battery, a rechargeable lanyard with Bluetooth capabilities that can connect to your earbuds to play music or talk on the phone, several sizes of foam ear tips to fit with a Noise Reduction Rating (NRR) of 28, and several sizes of silicone tips designed for staying in your ear during physical activities.
Check out our latest review over at Globo Surf!
Pro Ears Stealth Elite Prototype (shown with and without Bluetooth 5 lanyard)
Pro Shooter Susan Hansen Testing the Stealth Elite Prototype

Protecting our ears is essential if we want to hold onto our hearing for the rest of our life. Most hearing protection on the market today is either bulky, uncomfortable, or just doesn’t work nearly as well as it should. At Pro Ears, we believe that electronic hearing protection shouldn’t keep us from having fun or staying safe, it should give us the freedom to hear exactly what we want to hear.
Loyal Pro Ears Customers: Professional Shooters & Hunters

From our early days in a garage in Phoenix, to our 30,000 square foot facility in Northern Michigan, we at Pro Ears pride ourselves in producing handmade electronic hearing protection for over 25 years. Each of our electronic models are made from premium materials to give our customers unmatched quality. Originally designed for gun range enthusiasts, our previous models were more traditional in looks, but savvy in tech.
Retailers, Publications & Organizations That Sell, Trust & Depend on Pro Ears Hearing Protection Products
Pro Ears hearing protection is trusted by LAPD, Department of Homeland Security, Department of Justice and The United States Army

While hearing protection is useful for the gun range or mowing your lawn, we realized that we hadn’t tapped into our technology’s full potential. Fueled by the challenge of innovation, we redesigned our traditional ear muffs from the ground up. Rather than making a product that only protects your hearing, we wanted to make a lightweight product that could play music, amplify your surroundings and still let you hear the conversation happening next to you. That’s why we’re excited to present to you our latest model yet: The Pro Ears Stealth Elite.
Pro Ears Stealth Elite: 3 Products in 1- No Compromises

We've been developing this product prototype for over 2 years. As a seasoned company, we take research and development very seriously. We know our reputation depends upon it. And we take great pride in providing the highest quality hearing protection available on the market. The motivation behind creating the Stealth Elite was to create the a versatile hearing protection solution that would be compatible for nearly any environment or lifestyle.
Hear What You Want To Hear with Pro Ears Stealth Elite
At the shooting range.
5 times amplification, with industry trusted hearing protection
While biking, running or skiing.
Tested by runners and dancers to ensure secure in-ear fitment
Tested by tradesman in loud environments

Taking influence from some of our favorite behind-the-head headphones, we developed lightweight, waterproof earbuds with Bluetooth capabilities that produce high-fidelity sound quality, but also can act as hearing protection for dangerously loud environments. This small innovation can handle even the toughest of environments.
Pro Ears Stealth Elite: The Technology Inside
Water Resistant with an IPX6 Rating

We've design the Stealth Elite with all uses in mind. The water resistance testing on these was rated to an IPX6 rating, which means they can resist high-pressure, heavy sprays of water, but not water submersion. They'll fully withstand heavy sweat from your workout or while you're jogging or biking in the rain. Technically IPX6 is rated as "water resistant".
3 Sound Settings, 0 Compromises: Isolation | Awareness | Amplification

Want to tune out the world so you can listen to music or your favorite podcast? Isolation mode gives you the ability to pay attention to what you want to listen to. Setting the Elites to Awareness mode allows external noises to enter through the ear bud, without interrupting whatever you’re listening to. Perfect for people who are cycling to work but still need to hear a car passing you from behind. If you’re the hunting type, then you’ll love our Amplification mode. By switching the ear buds to Amplification, you’ll be able to amplify quiet sounds up to three times their normal decibel.

By using miniaturized analog circuits and noise isolating microphones, the Stealth Elites comes with an incredible amount of features. With three modes of operation, the Stealth Elites are ready for whatever you want to listen to.
Package contents
Included with each pair of Pro Ears Stealth Elite:
Some of our team in Grawn, Michigan (including our office guard dog)

So why are we pre-selling our greatest product with Indiegogo? At Pro Ears, we are a small family-run business who primarily makes our products in-house. But in the last two years, we managed to partner with a world-class sourcing company with years of experience in bringing unique products to market. However, being as small as we are, we need your help to purchase the specialized tooling needed to bring our project to market, as well as be able to order the parts at a volume discount. Pre-selling units reduces our financial risk when bringing a new product to market and will allow us to produce the most feature rich product possible at the best price possible.
Our sound engineering partners assembling and testing the Stealth Elite prototype

As you can see, we have the design and prototypes already finalized and ready for business. And our sourcing company is standing by us to help coordinate all stages of production and logistics. This not only ensures that you’ll get your Stealth Elites on time, but that you’ll receive the highest quality Stealth Elites we can possibly make.

With all the great components we've built into the Stealth Elites, we would have to charge a higher premium that could equal over $150 per unit. By backing our campaign for an exclusive early-bird discount, you can be one of the first to experience hearing protection that lets you choose what you want to hear while allowing us to purchase the tooling required to build the Stealth Elites at scale.
From all of us at Pro Ears, thank you for your support!

title: Liberux NEXX
description: THE LINUX PHONE YOU’VE BEEN WAITING FOR.
allParagraphs: THIS CAMPAIGN IS CLOSED
Liberux NEXX
THE LINUX PHONE YOU’VE BEEN WAITING FOR.
THE LINUX PHONE YOU’VE BEEN WAITING FOR.

The phone for free people.
Most smartphones today are built around a model that prioritizes the manufacturer’s control over the user’s freedom. There’s a deep lack of transparency, growing conflicts of interest, and constant surveillance disguised as convenience. We set out to build something different. Liberux NEXX is our answer: a phone that doesn’t spy on you, doesn’t hide its code, and doesn’t rely on opaque commercial agendas. It’s a solution that’s free, ethical, and open. We chose Open Source as our foundation and privacy as a principle — not a product. This is a device for those who refuse to trade their digital sovereignty for comfort.

The Liberux NEXX is a high-performance Linux smartphone designed from the ground up for privacy, openness, and power. It packs an octa-core Rockchip RK3588S CPU (4×Cortex-A76 + 4×Cortex-A55 up to 2.4 GHz) with 32 GB LPDDR4x RAM and a 6.34″ 2400×1080 OLED display. Storage is plentiful – 512 GB of replaceable and expandable eMMC plus expandable microSD (up to 2 TB) – and connectivity includes dual USB-C ports, 5G, Wi-Fi 5, Bluetooth 5.0, and even a headphone jack.

The NEXX runs LiberuxOS, a Debian 13-based Linux distribution that is ethical and open-source. The system uses a Liberux customiced Gnome Shell Mobile, providing a polished, multitasking-friendly interface adapted to smartphones and tablets. It's designed with convergence in mind: when connected to a larger screen and keyboard, the interface shifts into a desktop-style environment. You can use NEXX as your daily smartphone – and then turn it into a full workstation in seconds.

The software is also compatible with Android applications, thanks to container-based isolation (like WayDroid), which allows you to use popular apps without compromising system integrity or user privacy.

Hardware kill-switches let you physically cut power to the modem, Wi-Fi/Bluetooth module, and camera/microphone system whenever you choose, ensuring your data stays private. When all three switches are flipped down, they also disable additional components like the GNSS unit (GPS and related satellite systems), the IMU (accelerometer, gyroscope, magnetometer), and ambient and proximity sensors. In short, NEXX combines laptop-class specs with user-owned software – making it one of the most powerful, open, and secure Linux phones to date.

Building on years of Linux expertise (our team’s past projects and passion for freedom), Liberux NEXX was inspired by the desire to give people “freedom to own your hardware, your software, and your own life”. We envision a phone you can upgrade and customize for years, not a disposable gadget. Every aspect – from the removable memory and 5300 mAh battery to planned 5-year software support – is aimed at resisting planned obsolescence and mass data collection. Our roadmap even includes accessories (like a wireless RDP dock or a keyboard) to turn your phone into a full PC when needed. In short, NEXX stands for privacy, security, and freedom – a true pocket computer that respects you.
High-End Performance: 8‑core (up to 2.4 GHz) CPU, 32 GB LPDDR4x RAM, and 512 GB storage (plus optional 2 TB microSD) – enough power to run desktop-class Linux apps on the go.

Open-Source OS: LiberuxOS (Debian 13-based) puts you in control of software. Install and update safely (Debian is known for stability), with most source code available and 5+ years of planned updates.
Privacy by Design: No built-in tracking – “we will not collect or monitor any of your data”. Includes 3 physical kill-switches.
Extensive Connectivity: Dual USB-C 3.1 ports, 3.5 mm audio jack, and modern radios (5G, Wi-Fi 5, Bluetooth 5.0) for everything you need.
Desktop-Capable: Use NEXX as a mini-PC. With our planned wireless monitor/keyboard adapter (RDP support), you can connect to a monitor and peripherals to get a full desktop experience.

Long Battery & Expandability: Large 5300 mAh removable battery, plus a second USB-C port so you can charge while using accessories. The sturdy design and replaceable components maximize lifespan and reduce e-waste.

At Liberux, our commitment is simple: every euro raised through this crowdfunding campaign will be fully invested into making this device better — in both hardware and software. Our goal is to create a free, ethical, repairable, and user-respecting ecosystem.

We’re not here to maximize profit. We’re here to offer a real alternative in a market dominated by closed, disposable, and controlling devices. That’s why every development choice, every supplier, and every component is chosen with care — favoring local, ethical manufacturing and a transparent production process.

The Liberux Nexx is designed for continuous improvement. Key components like the battery and eMMC storage are easily accessible and replaceable. We want users to repair, upgrade, and extend the lifespan of their device — without depending on us or any corporation.
Backing us means more than just getting a product. It means helping shape a different kind of tech future.

During the years of development of Liberux NEXX, we've been fortunate to experiment with many of the devices that paved the way for open mobile technology. From the legendary Nokia N900 to gems like Purism’s Librem 5 or Pine64’s PinePhone Pro, we’ve bought, analyzed, and learned from each one of them. Personally, we want to thank all the teams behind these projects. The work they do is remarkable—not just for its technical achievements, but for their ethical commitment to user freedom. Our heartfelt thanks go to Purism, Pine64, PostmarketOS, Mobian, and the entire community that continues to push the boundaries of what’s possible in free software and open hardware. Without them, none of this would exist. We hope to add our own contribution and help build the future we all want to see: one where technology respects our freedom.

As for the current landscape, the Linux smartphone market is still limited, and most available devices feature modest or older-generation hardware. For example, the original PinePhone and PinePhone Pro use low-performance Rockchip SoCs and offer only 3–4 GB of RAM, while the Librem 5 runs on a 28 nm i.MX8M with 3 GB of RAM. These phones are excellent for enthusiasts and developers, but they don’t compete in performance with conventional smartphones.

In this context, Liberux NEXX breaks those limits: with 32 GB of RAM, 5G support, and a cutting-edge RK3588S processor, it stands as one of the most powerful Linux smartphones ever created. It also offers up to 2.5 TB of removable storage, a user-replaceable battery, and physical killswitches to maximize privacy. It’s a device designed not just for technical users, but for anyone who wants a complete, modern, and ethical mobile experience. In short, NEXX is an evolutionary leap within the Linux smartphone ecosystem.

We already have a working prototype of the Liberux NEXX and are actively testing its hardware and software stack. Our first mainboard has been fully assembled and debugged: after resolving a few minor hardware issues (such as solder-mask adjustments and component alignment), the RK3588S processor is now detected and communicating correctly with a host PC.

In parallel, we’re collaborating with a local manufacturing partner to improve PCB yield. Our software team is porting Debian 13 to the device, adapting GNOME Shell Mobile for daily use, and integrating Android app compatibility via a sandboxed container. These steps bring us close to a fully functional, user-ready platform.
This campaign will allow us to transition from a tested engineering prototype to a certified and manufactured device, ready to ship to our backers.

The Liberux NEXX has been designed with a modular architecture for key components: storage, memory, and mobile modem. This enables not only repairability and upgrades, but also the reuse of parts in future motherboard revisions.

Storage (eMMC):
  We use interchangeable modules compatible with the same standard sockets used by Orange Pi and Radxa.
Currently available:
128 GB (included)

RAM:
  Each DRAM chip is mounted on a small PCB with an FPC connector, similar to the eMMC module. This allows upgrades or replacements without soldering directly to the mainboard.
Available options:
8 GB (included)

LTE/5G Modem:
  We integrate commercial modem modules via a custom-designed adapter board. This connects to the mainboard using a single FPC connector.
Available options:
LTE (included)
All modules are connected via standard buses and connectors, avoiding proprietary or soldered-in components wherever possible.

The hardware designs (adapter boards, sockets, connectors) will be published under open licenses, enabling other manufacturers or communities to reuse them — and ensuring that future NEXX revisions with different SoCs remain compatible with existing modules.

It’s not just a phone. With our custom-designed accessories, the Nexx becomes a true workstation or a portable productivity tool. These add-ons expand its capabilities, enhance the experience, and adapt to multiple usage styles.

Liberux Mechanical Keyboard
A compact mechanical keyboard with an '80s-inspired look and pocket-size form. It connects to the Nexx’s second side USB-C port and offers:
Built-in 6000 mAh battery that also charges your Nexx
Multiple extra ports: USB, video output, and more
Rugged, portable, retrofuturistic design — ideal for programmers, writers, or terminal junkies

W-Dock (Wireless Dock)
A compact wireless dock to use the Nexx as your desktop PC. Just plug in a keyboard, mouse, and monitor, then wirelessly link with your Nexx.
Plug & play — no advanced setup required. Just scan a QR code that appears on the screen connected to the W-Dock and the NEXX is instantly paired.
Turns your Nexx into a full workstation from anywhere
Subtle design, perfect for the desk or your backpack

2 TB MicroSD
Expand total storage to 2.5 TB by combining the removable eMMC and the microSD slot.
Perfect for media libraries, projects, or full backups
Fully compatible with LiberuxOS from the very first boot
Ideal for those using Nexx as a portable workstation or primary device

We’re raising funds to move into full production and certification. Every euro will go toward manufacturing the first batch of Liberux NEXX phones and companion devices, completing regulatory certifications (CE, FCC, OSHW), refining the software, and delivering rewards to backers.
What We Need:
Major cost factors include:
Components & Manufacturing: Bulk ordering of parts (chips, battery, casing, etc.) and PCB/assembly runs.
Certification & Compliance: We’ll allocate funds for lab testing and certification (CE, FCC, OSHW) so the phone can ship worldwide.

Engineering & Software: Final PCB revisions, battery testing, camera tuning, and polished LiberuxOS images (Linux kernel work, drivers, UI). We also budget long-term software support (security updates for 5+ years).
Logistics & Fulfillment: Packaging, shipping costs, and backer support (order processing, helpdesk, etc.).
What You Get:
We offer several reward tiers so backers can choose what fits them:

Community Backers – from €790:
  One Liberux NEXX phone (8GB RAM, 128GB eMMC, LTE). You can customize your device by selecting add-ons: more RAM, more storage, or 5G — paying only for the difference.

First Backers – €1300:
  One fully assembled and tested NEXX smartphone (32GB RAM, 512GB eMMC, 5G), plus optional add-ons like a 2TB microSD card and W-Dock Black.

Golden Backers – €2048:
  One complete NEXX smartphone (32GB RAM, 512GB eMMC, 5G), a 2TB microSD card, W-Dock White, and a premium mechanical keyboard with extended ports — designed to unleash the full potential of your device. This tier is a special thank-you to those who want to go the extra mile in supporting our mission.
? Note: Depending on your country, local import duties or taxes may apply after delivery.

By supporting Liberux NEXX you’re not just buying a phone – you’re advancing an open, ethical technology movement. Every device delivered means more digital freedom for users and less power for data-harvesting corporations. Key impacts include:

Privacy & Security: NEXX never tracks your activity or sells your data. Hardware kill-switches give you ultimate control over your signals. This empowers individuals to communicate and work without surveillance, aligning with the vision that “Free software is a matter of liberty” (Richard Stallman).

Open Ecosystem: By using Debian Linux and open hardware principles, we cultivate a community-driven platform. You can inspect, modify, and share all the software – freedom that big-phone makers never allow. Community feedback will guide future features, ensuring the tech truly serves users.

Longevity & Sustainability: We reject planned obsolescence. The NEXX’s software will be supported for years, and its hardware is modular and repair-friendly. This contrasts sharply with disposable phones; a well-supported NEXX can last through many upgrade cycles, reducing electronic waste.

Social & Technical Innovation: A successful campaign proves there’s demand for privacy-respecting devices. It encourages more developers to build open drivers and apps for ARM Linux. We see over 112 million Linux desktop users (and counting) as future adopters of mobile Linux, growing a vibrant ecosystem.
In summary, Liberux NEXX is not just a product – it’s a statement. It promotes a future where technology respects users and the planet.
We believe in full transparency about risks, and we have plans to address each. Key challenges include:

Hardware & Manufacturing: As with any new gadget, early prototypes may reveal design issues. Our first dev-board did have a few minor faults (mis-oriented parts, a charging circuit tweak, etc.) which we identified and fixed immediately. Going forward, we have a trusted local manufacturer helping to refine the PCB and assembly process, greatly reducing the chance of future errors.

Software Development: Porting and optimizing a full Linux system to new hardware is complex. We are basing LiberuxOS on Debian 13 (a proven, stable Linux distribution) and we have already booted the OS on our dev board. We will use iterative testing and open-source tools to debug drivers. By working in public and inviting community testing early, we can catch and fix issues faster.

Supply Chain & Timing: Global parts shortages and shipping delays are industry-wide concerns. To mitigate this problem, we will enter into agreements with several suppliers of critical components (CPUs, displays, etc.).
Certification & Regulations: Securing CE and FCC certifications can be time-consuming and costly. We have factored in these costs and lead times into our plan.

Logistics: Shipping electronics worldwide can face customs and carrier issues. We will work with fulfillment partners who specialize in international shipments and keep transparent shipping timelines.
Every risk above is met with experience and preparation. We will keep backers updated on milestones and any hurdles – and we’re committed to resolving issues as they arise.
Your support doesn’t have to be financial. Here are some ways to help without pledging:
Spread the Word: Share our campaign and story on social media, tech forums, blogs, and with friends or colleagues who care about privacy and open tech. Word-of-mouth is vital.
Join the Conversation: Follow us on Mastodon to give feedback, ask questions, or translate our materials into other languages. A tip, review, or blog post can make a big difference.
Engage with Media: If you have connections to tech journalists, invite them to write about us. Coverage in tech news sites raises awareness and credibility.
Stay Informed: Sign up for updates on our website or follow #Liberux on social platforms. Backers love seeing progress photos and build reports.
Every share, comment, or contribution helps turn Liberux NEXX from a project into reality. Thank you for being part of this journey toward a freer, more secure digital future!

Display stocks, crypto, forex, weather, news, sports, GIFs, images and more in beautiful, 128x32 sized, RGB pixels. Whether you choose to display one, two, four or all features together, everything will seamlessly transition from one feature to the next, truly making this an ultimate, all-in-one LED ticker!

To get started, simply connect the ticker to your Wi-Fi, connect any device with an internet browser to the same Wi-Fi network, and you can control everything that gets displayed on the ticker through your internet browser. Once you have chosen your desired settings, the ticker will stay updated on its own via Wi-Fi connection.
Here at Fintic, it is our mission to make information more accessible and beautiful, pixel by pixel!

Our stocks feature would make such a cool addition to your office, trading desk, man cave or whatever else you can think of! The ticker can display real time prices and daily point changes of all U.S. equities and ETFs. The ticker also comes with thousands of readily made company logos to really enhance that Wall Street feel!

Keep track of real time prices and 24 hour changes of thousands of cryptocurrencies! Base currencies can be changed to any world currency or other cryptocurrencies. E.g. BTC/USD, BTC/ETH, ETH/GBP etc. This feature also comes with thousands of crypto logos available for display!

Calling all FX traders, get live exchange rates and 24 hour changes of major, minor currency pairs as well as exotic currency pairs with our ticker! USD, NZD, AUD, GBP, EUR, CZK, JPY, KRW, RUB, CNY, SGD, THB... and many more!

Display current weather data as well as 7 day forecasts from a list of over 200,000 cities around the world! We have information about UV, chance of precipitation, wind speed and direction, high low temperatures, current temperature, humidity, percent of clouds, visibility, feels like temperature etc.

Display live headlines from around the world! You can choose between random, country specific, category specific (business, entertainment, general, health, science, sports, technology) or source specific headlines. The headlines also come with information such as date and time posted, source name etc. We have hundreds of news logos from all kinds of sources such as ABC News, Bloomberg, BBC News, Business Insider, Associated Press, MSNBC, ESPN, The Independent and many more!

Add a bit more life to your sports bar with the ticker's sports feature! You can display live games, upcoming games, past games and team stats, along with hundreds of sport team logos. The ticker covers the NFL, NHL, NBA and the Premier League! We will soon implement PGA and MLB into the feature too!

Upload your own images, GIFs or type out custom messages to display on the ticker! With this feature you can turn the ticker into party lights, an arcade marquee sign, a bar sign, a mini LED advertising billboard... Be creative!

There are plenty of customization options with the ticker to ensure that users get the best experience out of them. Adjust the speed or brightness to your liking, throw in a couple of transition animations between features, or choose to display feature title graphics and many more!
Choose how you want your ticker to be displayed with our 2 main display formats! This can all be arranged via the web control panel.
We have the classic, old school, full size scrolling display style that resembles the exciting and fast paced atmosphere of NYC.

We also have what we like to call the “Professional Display” style. The ticker is split into two rows, with each row displaying different kinds of information simultaneously. Both rows can also move at different speeds. How cool is that?!

Finally, we are also developing a static display style, where the ticker will cycle through different features in a more static and steady fashion. Keep an eye out on our social media pages for upcoming sneak peaks! ;)
HKD prices for rewards converted to USD, EUR
1. Plug and play - Plug the power cord into your home socket to start up the ticker!
2. Connect ticker to Wi-Fi - Connect the ticker to your Wi-Fi in seconds via its hotspot captive portal web interface.

3. Access web control panel via laptop or smartphone - Or any device with an internet browser.  Simply connect the device to the same Wi-Fi network as the ticker, and you can easily access the control panel through the ticker's given hostname.

4. The web control panel - Arrange what features to display, what specific items within each feature to display, how you want them to be displayed, change any settings you wish, choose which display mode... All done via the web control panel!
5. Software updates - Simply go on the web control panel, click on the update button, and let the ticker do its own thing!
Specifications
Parts are sourced from high quality, reputable manufacturers and suppliers such as Mean Well, Raspberry Pi, Adafruit Industries and RS Components.

It has been a long journey. Since September 2020, we spent a lot of time prototyping, experimenting and perfecting the ticker design. From the initial stages of just coding the software, fixing bugs, to 3D printing the ticker case, doing CAD CAM work, assembling and fitting components inside the case, taking measurements, consulting with manufacturers etc.
Early prototyping, measurements, specifications for the Fintic case design.
Coding, testing and developing the software.
Final CAD CAM files, ready to be sent to manufacturers for molding and tooling. Draft angles, undercuts, ribs, tolerances, material choice, all finalized for mass production!
And of course, a TON of 3D printing too! :D
After over a year of extensive development, testing, CAD CAM, prototyping and R&D, we've finally come up with the perfect design and are ready to mass produce these tickers.

Our estimated ship dates for IndieGogo pre-orders are Feb 2022! So that means after the campaign is funded, we will immediately begin production! From ordering components, to manufacturing the ticker frames, hand assembling the tickers, packaging, testing and doing QA on the software. Should any issues with the Feb 2022 deadline arise, we will be sure to notify all backers and keep them updated!
We estimate that we can start shipping units around February 2022. Units will be shipped from our warehouse in Hong Kong. With that said, expect international shipping time to be around 2 weeks long.

We should be able to ship to almost all countries in the world. However, there are a few select countries that our carrier cannot ship to. If we can't ship to your country, we will notify you immediately and offer full refund / cancel your pledge.
The Fintic team will work hard to push new updates and features for users to enjoy! Given that the ticker is powered by a mini computer, the possibilities are endless!

Fintic Limited was founded in September 2020 by Justin Dunn and Neythen Treloar. Coming from a background in game design and data analytics, natural sciences and scientific computing respectively, both Justin and Neythen took their passion for LED lights, electronics and the stock market to create a beautiful looking desk size LED ticker. Together, they share the mission and vision of making information more accessible and beautiful, pixel by pixel.

If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to shoot us a message here on Kickstarter, or send us an email at info@fintic.io. Feel free to also check out our website at fintic.io and our press kit! Thank you all so much for your time!
Facebook
Instagram
YouTube
Twitter
Risks and challenges

1. Potential delays with manufacturer: Depending on the overall demand for this product, if the demand exceeds the total supply that our manufacturers and suppliers can offer, this could cause potential delays in the shipping of components required to assemble these tickers. In this scenario, we will be sure to work vigorously with our manufacturers to increase volume of production and ensure that supply chain is fully operational to meet the demand. Should this problem arise, we will also be transparent and let all our backers know about such problem and keep them fully updated on the situation.

2. Failure to meet expected delivery date: Again, relating to the possibility of demand exceeding supply, given that we are a relatively small team, and the tickers are all hand assembled, we may not have enough labour force to meet the demand. Should we start falling behind schedule, the plan would be to hire even more staff to help assemble, package and ship the tickers as quickly as possible. We could also outsource assembly work to factories in China to speed things up.
3. By backing this project, you agree to our terms of service, return policy and privacy policy listed on our website: https://fintic.io/
Long-lasting design

E-waste is something that we are very concerned with and have thought through carefully. With that said, we source some of the highest quality hardware and components to ensure that the product will last as long as possible. The hardware design also makes it so that repairing the tickers is very simple and easily accessible.
