title: Botanium Vega - Simplified Indoor Gardening
description: Featuring a long-lasting water tank, large growing space, grow light and app connectivity.
allParagraphs: Featuring a long-lasting water tank, large growing space, grow light and app connectivity.

Botanium Vega is a compact, easy and effortless way of growing. Its a hydroponic pot, which means it grows plants like chilies, herbs and tomatoes without soil. It waters the plants automatically.  Leave it for a month and get back to a healthy plant.

Botanium was first revealed on Kickstarter early 2017. In only 5 days we were fully funded with 1420 backers from all over the world. In the end of same year we shipped around 2500 units to 65 different countries. We are now ready to launch our second product - Botanium Vega.
Botanium Vega is minimalistically designed self-watering planter that enables you to grow herbs and veggies using soil-less growing technology.

Plant a seed, plug it in and you can leave it alone for weeks as it takes care of the plant for you. You get more productive plants and there is no need to worry about over or under watering, the most common ways to kill plants.

There is a rising demand for ways to grow your own food. In a modern busy life, tending to a plant’s needs might be your last priority. And even if you do have time, you might not know how to keep it alive. Enjoy growing herbs or chili without effort. Botanium Vega takes care of the plant for you, thanks to automated, soil-free growing. Botanium Vega comes with a wider design than its predecessor with room for up to four plants.

Vega features a water tank with room for 5 liter (1.3 gallon) of water. Compared with our first Botanium, this is 5x the volume and 25% more water per plant. (if you grow four plants in it). Thanks to this, the water lasts for many weeks.
Vega automatically waters your plants multiple times per day. We have also made it possible to change this schedule so that you can make it water every hour or just once every day.

Botanium Vega uses soil-less - so called hydroponic - gardening technology to grow plants from seed. This has many advantages - the plants can grow larger using less roots, and they will also regrow quicker after harvest.
This also enables the Vega to automatically water the plants without needing to measure the moisture in the soil.

By popular request, our new Botanium Vega is connected to your smartphone using the Botanium app. Use it to get notifications when you need to refill it, and to monitor your Botanium when you are away from home.
We also include a powerful 20 watt LED growing light that enables you to grow anywhere - even during the dark winter. It can be adjusted in height and controlled through the Botanium app.

Hydroponics is simply growing without soil. The roots need water, nutrients and oxygen, all of which can be provided in a more efficient way than in soil. Botanium's porous growing medium absorbs a lot of water, while also providing an aerated environment for the roots.
The benefits of this are not only quicker growth and more control, but also a simpler approach to growing.

The great thing about hydroponics is that you can never overwater the plants you grow. Therefore, you don't need to take into account things like letting the soil dry out before watering again (and not waiting too long so your plants wilt).

  All you need to do is to fill the reservoir when you see the water level getting low. The water lasts several week (depending on the plant, light and heat)

At Botanium, we believe that gardening should be simple and available to everyone, even to those living in a city or without much time to take care of a plant. We want to change how greens and herbs are produced indoors, making it possible to bring out the gardener in everyone.
Grow basil
Basil grows quite fast and is a good alternative for the impatient grower. As it needs a lot of water, it thrives in the Botanium where it gets watered often and evenly.
Grow tomatoes
Like its' relatives chili peppers, potatoes and tobacco, tomatoes originate from South America. It is a fast growing plant that thrives in hydroponic systems like Botanium.
Grow chili
What makes chili growing so rewarding is that even a small amount of chili lasts a long time – in contrast to strawberries for instance, which you easily can eat faster than it grows.
You can also grow rocket salad, thyme, oregano, strawberries, mint and much much more.
Botanium Vega features a 20 watt growing light that is adjustable in height. So as your plants grow you can unscrew the knob and adjust the light accordingly.

The lamp is equipped with state-of-the-art LEDs that are attached to a lamp screen made of extruded aluminum. This screen does not only eliminates glare, but also works as a powerful heatsink that makes it possible to run the LEDs cool - making them run efficently at 175 lumen per watt.
The lamp can be removed if you have a sunny window and you don't need the extra light.

When talking with Botanium users, it was clear that a highly requested feature was app connectivity. And we listened! From the very start, it was important for us to make an app only if it made sense, and if it could be useful. We didn't want to create an app that is just another gimmick. The Botanium Vega has optimized default settings in place that doesn't require you to use the app - but it does add extra controls and features.
The Botanium app is connected to Vega with wi-fi, so you can keep track of your grow wherever you are.
Water level
Keep track of the current water level and get notified when the water level runs low. If you plan to be away from home a few weeks, you can easily check if you need to refill before leaving.
Nutrients

Different kind of plants have different nutrient demands. The Botanium app calculates the right amount of nutrient based on the plants you grow. Specify what you grow, and it will tell you how much nutrients you need to add each time you refill the water.
Lamp
Turn the lamp on and off from your couch. You can also schedule when the lamp turns on or off, so that you don't need to be disturbed by it early in on a sunday morning.

Botanium is designed in Sweden, a country that embodies the Scandinavian design movement. This style – often referred to as minimalist – developed during the Second World War, with clean, simple lines and a strong emphasis on functionality. A common theme in this tradition is that beautiful and functional objects should be available to all.

Botanium Vega consists of a 5 liter water tank and a growing container. A water pump moves water up to top, and distributes it evenly over the growing medium. It trickles down and returns back to the water tank, so it later can be reused.

Dimensions: 530 mm (20,9") x 145 mm (5,7") x 200 mm (7.9") (without lamp)
Color: White (if the stretch goal is achieved, two additional colors will be unlocked.)
Plug: Vega will be shipped with plugs for Europe, US, UK and Australia/New Zealand.
Power: 12V
Lamp: 20 w LED light, 200 ppfd @ 100 mm
Connectivity: Wi-fi
Usage: Indoor use only

We have been testing several functioning prototypes over the last year to make sure that it works as intended. Since Vega is the evolution of our first product, we have applied what we have learned from that and improved it.
It is important to us that it does not only work as intended and looks good, but also that the design is user-friendly and intuitive.

Botanium was founded in Stockholm in 2016 by a group of designers and engineers with a passion for creating innovative products that enable everyone to grow their own food without compromising their modern lifestyle. We strive to accelerate and simplify urban gardening, enabling everyone to be a grower.
We are glad to have such a competent team that can make Botanium Vega a reality!

Wanna grow in a Botanium now and can't wait until 2021? During the campaign for Botanium Vega, we will offer you 15% discount on our first Botanium that was first revealed in 2017 on Kickstarter and Indiegogo. It features the same hydroponic watering system as Vega in a more compact design. Head over to our webshop botanium.se and use the code INDIEGOGO15 or click here.
Thank you!

title: Speedy - World's Fastest Mini Pocket Knife
description: Mini Keychain Pocket Knife by Bomber and Company
allParagraphs: Mini Keychain Pocket Knife by Bomber and Company

Quick Deployment: One of the main advantages of the spring-loaded Speedy is the rapid deployment mechanism. With the press off the lever, the blade can be deployed swiftly and efficiently, making them ideal for situations where speed is essential, such as self-defense or emergency situations.

One-Handed Operation: Speedy can be operated with one hand, allowing for easy deployment even when the other hand is occupied. This can be particularly useful in situations where you need to keep one hand free for other tasks.

440 Carbon stainless steel is extremely high-grade. It offers a good balance of corrosion resistance, durability, ease of sharpening, and overall ease of use. It's easier to maintain and less prone to staining or rusting, especially in humid or wet environments.

Speedy is a highly versatile tool with a wide range of potential uses. Its versatility comes from its compact size, portability, and the various features it may include. Here are some common uses and situations where a pocket knife can be handy:
Everyday Tasks: Opening packages, cutting twine or rope, slicing fruit, or even cutting through tape or cardboard boxes.

DIY and Home Improvement: When working around the house or tackling DIY projects, a pocket knife can be useful for tasks like trimming materials, scoring surfaces, or even as a makeshift screwdriver in a pinch.

Outdoor Activities: A pocket knife is indispensable for camping, hiking, fishing, and other outdoor activities. It can be used for cutting small branches, preparing food, opening cans, or even for self-defense in emergencies.

Discrete conceal-ability, yet heavy-duty is the definition of the Speedy. The ultralight weight of the Speedy weighs less than 2oz. The miniature size of the pocket knife means it can easily be hidden in any coin pocket or clipped onto keychains without notice. Clip it to your keys, backpack, or even purse. The best knife is the one you are carrying.

The Speedy body/handle derives from G10, also known as Garolite.  It is woven fiberglass and sealed with epoxy resin making it very strong, durable, lightweight, and resistant to water, moisture, and temperature changes.  It offers a easy grip in any situation.
Speedy hosts a straight blade or "precision cut blade" and is fully flat ground. A flat ground blade makes it extremely versatile for most people's daily use of an every day carry.
Reducing Friction: The indentations help reduce surface area and create air pockets between the blade and the material being cut. This reduces friction, allowing for smoother and easier slicing.

Preventing Food from Sticking: The air pockets created by the indentations also help prevent food from sticking to the blade. This is particularly useful when slicing or chopping moist or sticky foods like cheese, fruits, or vegetables.
Overall, the perforated holes on a knife blade contribute to improved performance, efficiency, and user comfort during food preparation... it also looks way cooler.
For a limited time you can get the entire Bomber Collection consisting of 6 knives. Each pocket knife was individually released on Kickstarter over the past decade.

- Dog Tag Necklace (Fully Concealed Nano Blade)
- B-2 Nano Blade (World's Smallest Tactical Pocket Knife)
- Razor (Not your Average Box Cutter)
- B-2 Pocket Blade (Large Tactical Pocket Knife)
- Blitz (Tanto Pocket Knife)
- Speedy (World's Fastest Mini Pocket Knife)
+ Bonus Bomber Metal Lighter Sleeve

title: UltraFix Driver: Ti Magnetic Ratchet Screwdriver
description: Innovative Ratchet Design:7-Bit Ratchet Multi-Tool&Doubles as Window Breaker,Pry Bar,Nail Puller...
allParagraphs: Innovative Ratchet Design:7-Bit Ratchet Multi-Tool&Doubles as Window Breaker,Pry Bar,Nail Puller...
Welcome to our latest project—let’s get straight to it!

We all know how versatile hex-bit screwdrivers can be, but carrying a full-sized tool as part of your everyday carry (EDC)? That’s a hassle no one wants. So, we asked ourselves: Why can’t a screwdriver be both powerful and pocket-friendly?

After 12 months of development, we’re excited to introduce UltraFix—a compact, versatile tool designed to fit right into your pocket while offering all the functionality you need. It’s sleek, unobtrusive, and always ready when you need it, helping you do more while carrying less.
We didn’t just make a tool—we crafted a companion. The UltraFix is designed to feel natural and intuitive in your hand.
Its rounded, ergonomic shape and smooth chamfered edges ensure a comfortable grip, even when you’re applying full force. No discomfort, no strain—just seamless performance.

With Triple drive angle, an easy-to-operate ratchet mechanism, and a large-capacity bit storage, the UltraFix adapts to any repair challenge with ease. Magnetic features ensure smooth operation, while additional functions like a pry bar, nail puller, and glass breaker take versatility to a whole new level.
Designed for your everyday carry, UltraFix includes a lanyard attachment and a sturdy pocket clip, making it effortless to carry and ready for action at a moment’s notice.

Whether you’re handling household repairs, taking on DIY projects, or working on professional tasks, UltraFix keeps up with you every step of the way—delivering confidence, precision, and convenience all in one sleek design.

To us, the most useful tool is always the one that you have with you. That's why the UltraFix matches that of a EDC pocket knife. It's both comfortable to carry and easy to access without getting in the way.
With dimensions of just 13.23 cm long, 3.2 cm wide, and 0.9 cm thick, and weighing only 100g, the UltraFix defies expectations.

Don’t let its petite appearance fool you; this screwdriver brings the strength of a full toolbox right to your palm. It’s perfect for tight spaces or quick fixes, combining size and power in a sleek design.
The UltraFix driver features a full-sized handle and the ability to conveniently store, access, and customize the bits to meet virtually any situation.
Experience innovative craftsmanship with the UltraFix’s ingenious bit storage system, designed to house up to 7 bits securely within the handle.

With powerful magnetic retention, you’ll never have to worry about losing your bits again. The storage compartment is sealed with a rugged cover, shielding your bits from dirt and debris, while providing a satisfying tactile experience every time you reach for your tool.

No odd, half-sized, or proprietary bits here. We understand that everyone has different needs when it comes to daily tasks. So, being able to store and use 7 standard 1/4" hex bits that you already own allows you to quickly customize the bit bar to your needs.

Why limit yourself to one function? The UltraFix is designed to tackle a variety of tasks, allowing you to drive screws in any direction—be it vertically, horizontally, or at challenging angles. You’ll appreciate the freedom and speed it brings to your work, minimizing the need to switch between tools, thus allowing you to work more efficiently.
Tackle those hard-to-reach screws effortlessly with the built-in extension rod.

This thoughtful feature ensures that no task is out of reach, making it ideal for various applications—from assembling furniture to making precise repairs. The UltraFix adapts to your needs, letting you conquer every project with ease.
The UltraFix features powerful magnetic connections in both the bit storage and triple drive angles (three directional slots), ensuring smooth and reliable performance.
With strong magnets for steady operation and faster workflow, UltraFix makes every task seamless, whether overhead, at odd angles, or in tight spaces.

Screwdrivers without ratchets require you to continuously reposition your hand, which is both inefficient and time-consuming, especially during repetitive tasks. A ratchet allows you to turn screws without lifting and readjusting your grip. This simple mechanism makes repairs faster and smoother.
However, not all ratchet designs are created equal—many on the market come with significant drawbacks that we set out to solve.

In conventional edc screwdrivers, the ratchet mechanism is embedded into the tool. You turn it one way for forward motion and flip the tool for reverse motion. The problem? This design doesn’t hold the bit securely—you often have to manually press the bit in place, which is both awkward and inefficient.
To improve on this, some ratchets are designed to be detachable and magnetically reversed. While this solves the bit-holding problem, it introduces new issues:
Neither solution truly delivers a seamless experience. That’s where the UltraFix Ratchet comes in.

We completely reimagined the ratchet mechanism to overcome these challenges:
The UltraFix features a fully enclosed ratchet mechanism. This ensures durability, eliminates wear and tear issues, and provides a smooth, reliable operation for years to come.
Changing the ratchet direction is as simple as pressing the directional button. No flipping, detaching, or fumbling—just a smooth transition between forward, reverse, and locked positions.
In short, The UltraFix ratchet doesn’t just solve the problems of existing tools—it redefines what a compact, efficient screwdriver can be.

Titanium alloy offers the perfect balance of strength, lightness, and durability, making it the ideal material for high-performance tools like the UltraFix. Resistant to rust, wear, and tear, the UltraFix is designed to handle the demands of daily use while retaining its sleek, polished appearance. Lightweight, tough, and corrosion-proof, it’s a tool that delivers unmatched performance wherever you go—built to last, crafted from the ultimate material.

With UltraFix, you’re investing in a tool that’s built to last. Imagine the projects you can tackle without constantly replacing inferior tools. One UltraFix can replace a whole range of traditional screwdrivers, offering you exceptional value and reliability.

The UltraFix isn’t just a screwdriver—it’s a versatile pry bar ready to tackle stubborn tasks with ease. Whether you’re opening lids, removing nails, or separating materials, the UltraFix provides the leverage you need, effortlessly.
Made from durable titanium, the pry bar combines strength with portability. Small enough to carry, powerful enough to deliver.

A window breaker isn’t something you use every day, but when you need it, it’s absolutely essential. By integrating this function into the UltraFix, we ensure it’s always within reach as part of your EDC toolkit. Whether for personal safety or unexpected situations, this tool provides peace of mind wherever you go.
With the UltraFix window breaker, you’re equipped for life’s unexpected emergencies—whether for yourself or others. It’s more than a tool; it’s a lifesaver in your pocket.
When you’re on the move, the UltraFix has you covered. The built-in pocket clip allows you to secure it to your pocket or bag, ensuring it’s always within reach.
Plus, the integrated lanyard hole provides extra grip, so you’ll never risk losing this indispensable tool during crucial moments.

Craftsmanship doesn’t stop at sundown. With three tritium slots, the UltraFix is designed for low-light conditions—perfect for those late-night projects. You’ll always be prepared to tackle any task, regardless of the time of day or night.
Your tools should match your personality. UltraFix offers two premium finishes:
Both finishes deliver the same durability and performance. Choose the one that fits your style and make the UltraFix truly yours.
Equip yourself with a screwdriver that stands tall, ready to face whatever life—and your projects—throw your way.

Every reward comes with a durable titanium alloy stonewashed finish, designed to handle frequent use while retaining its sleek appearance over time. Each package includes 7 essential bits, so you’re ready to go right out of the box. Prefer other bit types? Additional options are available in the add-on section. Plus, we’re thrilled to offer free worldwide shipping to all backers. We hope the UltraFix becomes your go-to tool for efficient and effortless repairs!

3D projection technology is an advanced technique that uses interference and diffraction principles to record and reproduce three-dimensional images of objects. It converts digital holographic images into visible images through a backlight source and projects them using a series of optical lenses, creating a three-dimensional visual effect.

Commercial 3D projectors have been confined to business use due to their bulk, high cost, and complexity. Twelvetooo leverages this technology to deliver a compact, glasses-free 3D projector for home use, offering optimized visuals, reduced size, and affordability—making 3D Video for everyday life.

To clarify, all 3D effects shown on our product page are based on real image displays, ensuring transparency about what our technology delivers. Twelvetooo brings the magic of 3D projection into your daily life.

Twelvetooo's naked-eye 3D display technology delivers vivid, three-dimensional visuals without the need for glasses or additional devices. This innovation introduces a new application for 3D imaging technology, transforming traditional perceptions and enabling a seamless transition from 2D to 3D displays.
Twelvetooo’s 3D projector dramatically enhances color saturation, making each frame vibrant and dynamic. As you move around the device, the 3D images retain clarity and rich detail from every angle.

title: AirTaste: Multi-functional Cookware with Air-Layer
description: Tasty and nutritious meals without oil, stirring, burning, boiling over or sticking.
allParagraphs: Tasty and nutritious meals without oil, stirring, burning, boiling over or sticking.

AirTaste will become an extra hand in your kitchen. Let AirTaste cook for you and free up your time for other interests rather than cooking all day. Became a multi-tasker and spend more quality time with your family.
Just add your ingredients to AirTaste. Place it on the stove. Go play with your kids, watch a movie, or read a book… and come back when it’s ready!
And the heat is then distributed evenly across the entire surface of your pot — even its sides! — making sure you eat a fully-cooked, nutrient-rich meal every time.
Cooking healthy meals doesn’t need to be a challenge. Or time-consuming. Or something only Gordon Ramsay can do!
With the magic of AirTaste and its patented Air Layer Technology, you’ll be cooking healthier meals effortlessly in no time.

With conventional pots, food burns, boils over, sticks to the bottom, and cooks unevenly… so people have created tons of appliances that attempt to solve specific problems, and cook a limited variety of foods.
Your stove heats an outer layer, that heats an inner air chamber, before heating the inner layer and your food.

With its Air Layer Technology, German hollow super-cool stainless steel handles, and its ultra-light construction, AirTaste is the advanced cookware that simplifies your kitchen and makes it easier for you to cook good food.
AirTaste’s steady heat preserves foods’ essential nutrients — and precious time! — no matter how thick that bolognese, jam, soup, sauce… and everything in between!
AirTaste’s evenly heated layer of air makes sure every meal is always thoroughly and evenly cooked with almost no input.
You know how when you defrost food in the microwave it’ll make one side burning hot while another is still frozen? And don’t get me started on that microwave ‘flavor’...
With AirTaste, you’ll be cooking frozen food directly from the freezer. Without waiting long hours or burning your food.
We can’t legally say it tastes as though it were fresh… but it kind of does! ?

Avoid using the microwave to defrost, or waiting long hours for your frozen ingredients to defrost manually. With its layer of air, AirTaste effectively conducts heat and allows your meat and vegetables to defrost evenly and cook simultaneously.

AirTaste elevates your food from the flame with a layer of air and a non-toxic non-stick coating. It makes cooking so easy, and this ensures it’s cooked consistently, at safer temperatures, and with no risk of burning or smoke.  Meaning you get healthier meals and a healthier living environment!
No Burning = No Smoke + More Nutrients!
In a conventional pot — where temperatures vary by over 200 degrees between the edges and the center — wild convection currents are formed as the hot water rises solely from the center.
With AirTaste, the heat comes from all directions, creating a controlled steady cooking experience. Free from boilovers and messes.
What’s tastier — the natural juices within each ingredient or added water?
The patented Air Layer Technology — coupled with a non-toxic coating that is slippery even without any oil applied — means you can cook meats and vegetables in their own juices!
You’ll preserve the healthy nutrients, won’t water down the flavor, and will avoid the unhealthy burning of greases, butter, and oils.

Heat is the most important factor that sets apart the healthiest meal from the most harmful. When you use your regular pan, the extreme heat concentrated in the bottom-center can turn proteins into carcinogens and omega 3 oils into trans fats.
AirTaste’s patented air layer gives you more control overheating, so every meal you cook preserves all the good nutrients!
Did you know that coal turns into diamond under extreme heat and pressure? And what about when you oxidize and anodize Aluminum to turn it into Sapphire?

AirTaste’s non-stick coating is applied over a base of Sapphirine Ceramic. This is a much stronger base and ensures much longer durability. As it inherits the gemstone’s toughness — it’s the 2nd hardest gemstone — and food-safe properties.

Non-stick coatings contain PTFE which becomes toxic above 500 degrees Fahrenheit (260 Celsius). Typical pots and pans can easily reach these temperatures, and toxic PTFEs are often found in home-cooked meals!
With AirTaste’s air layer, the inner layer doesn’t go above a safe 392 degrees Fahrenheit (200 Celsius), meaning your food and AirTaste will always be safe and healthy!
AirTaste’s coating is made without PFOA, a toxic chemical typically found in non-stick coatings.
Cooking fumes contain carcinogenic and mutagenic compounds such as polycyclic aromatic hydrocarbons and heterocyclic compounds. Big words. Big problems.
AirTaste hardly burns foods, and lab results show up to 100 times less toxic fumes are created by meals cooked with AirTaste.
AirTaste is made of Hith-quality materials, it's produced in Korea and handles and knobs in Germany.
Gone are the days of non-stick coatings chipping or just wearing down in under a year!
Thanks to AirTaste’s super durable Sapphirine Ceramic Base Layer, the inner non-stick coating lasts many more years of cooking.

AirTaste’s German-made stainless steel handles stay cooler for longer. Even as your AirTaste gets hotter, thanks to their hollow design! The handle temperatures does not reach extream temperatures unless flames touch the handles.

Dutch Ovens and AirTaste, although the temperature distribution gap is huge as we introduced with the cake cooking comparison above, Cast Iron Pots are known as the cookware that cooks delicious meals and has an even heat distribution before AirTaste was introduced! What also makes it different between Cast Iron pans and AirTaste is they do this using thick and heavy cast iron sides.
AirTaste is 2.5 times lighter than a Dutch oven or cast iron pans of the same size!

Cleaning is a breeze with AirTaste’s non-stick inner coating. One quick rinse will leave your AirTaste sparkling clean! AirTaste is also 100% dishwasher safe for the times when you don’t want to clean it by hand!
Our factory has been producing some of the best cookware for over 50 years. And AirTaste is the next generation of high-quality cookware.
But we know that Kickstarters sometimes overpromise and often underdeliver. So in order to make sure you’re 100% happy with your AirTaste, we’re offering backers an extended 3-year warranty.
We studied the most popular pot shapes and sizes to give you what you need. AirTaste comes in 4 standard sizes to meet all your culinary needs. From a Deep Pot to a Saute Pan:

Please note that these prices are estimates and final prices will be final at the time of shipping. Prices are excluded of any VAT, import and duty taxes, backers are responsible for such as they receive the products.

Please note that these prices are estimates and final prices will be final at the time of shipping. Prices are excluded of any VAT, import and duty taxes, backers are responsible for such as they receive the products. We can deliver world wide, and if you have any questions let us know.
For 50 years my father enjoyed the unique opportunity of combining his 2 greatest passions — engineering and food — in producing some of Korea’s highest quality cookware.
For decades, he tried to solve the problem of burning food and water boiling over with a magical elusive pot. He tried different materials. Different shapes. Different sizes. But nothing worked.
Then one day during a freezing cold winter, he was warming up in front of our traditional big coal stove.
And a wild thought hit him, “Our rice pot fits perfectly within the hole at the top of the stove! What if I just place the pot in the hole?”
No boilover.
No burning.
So he spent several years refining this concept, testing different materials, different thicknesses, different dimensions...
And today, we are so happy to introduce our baby — AirTaste — and achieve my father’s dearest dream of bringing healthier, effortless cooking to everyone!!!

title: The world’s first all-terrain reforesting robot!
description: Help build Trovador, a robot that reforests steep, burned land and restores nature at scale.
allParagraphs: Help build Trovador, a robot that reforests steep, burned land and restores nature at scale.
We’re Marta and Sebastião, two young, climate-focused engineers from Portugal.
We’re building Trovador, the world’s first autonomous robot that can plant tree seedlings quickly and effectively on any terrain – and it’s already been recognized globally (see below).
But we need your support to bring it to life and start restoring forests before the next fire season hits!
Growing up, we spent a lot of time around Portugal’s forests and mountains. But every summer, we watched more of these landscapes go from green to grey… and stay that way for years.

These are forests that should still be standing, and now urgently need to be brought back.
But right now, we don’t have the tools to bring them back fast enough.
The result? Biodiversity disappears, erosion gets worse, fire risk increases… and we lose our planet’s #1 carbon sink.

We’ve volunteered in reforestation efforts ourselves, but quickly realized that current methods (manual planting, tractors, drones…) simply aren’t restoring forests anywhere near the pace we need. See our FAQ for why.
We couldn’t help but wonder: If fire can tear through a forest in minutes, why does it have to take years even to begin bringing it back?
That question stuck with us. And eventually, Trovador became our answer!
An autonomous robot that can do what no other method today can: reforest steep, burned terrain with speed, precision, and care.
Our first prototype, built from recycled materials, proved the concept and gained global attention. Now we’re building the full-scale version.
What makes Trovador unique:
We’re raising 14,000€ exclusively to finish the full-scale robot: 4-legged platform + planting mechanism (motors, drills, sensors, wiring…).
And if we raise more than our goal? Every extra euro will go into planting more trees or upgrading the robot.
In short: every cent goes directly into making large-scale reforestation possible, whether in Portugal or, eventually, anywhere it's needed.
We know 14,000€ sounds like a lot, and it is. But it’s the necessary amount to make this solution real. For perspective, see the FAQ: “Is 14,000€ really necessary?”
Donate: even 2€ builds momentum.
Share: spreading the word wherever you can is just as powerful!
If everyone reading this tossed a coin our way and got a few friends to do the same, we’d be planting forests in no time!
If we don’t hit our goal, every donation is refunded, so we’re counting on everyone who sees this and feels aligned with our mission!

You can contribute securely via this platform or directly:
IBAN: PT50 0018 0003 1811 4488 0209 4
MB Way (for Portuguese supporters): 932 520 208

Marta built her first robot at age 9 and has since developed ocean-cleaning drones and seaweed-monitoring systems, which led to her being recognized by National Geographic as a conservation roboticist.

After representing Portugal at global STEM competitions where he led award-winning teams, Sebastião designed a National Geographic–recognized circular economy app and a satellite-guided tool for optimizing post-fire forest restoration.
After high school, we spent the past year working full-time on Trovador, alongside a growing team of young engineers.
And we’re not stopping until Trovador is replanting the forests the world needs back.
All this support says one thing: the world is ready, and so are we!
With your help, we’ll bring Trovador to life and start bringing forests back, one tree at a time… or a couple hundred ;)
Thank you so much for any kind of support!

Would you like to join us?
Whether you’re into tech, ecology, marketing, or just want to help, we’d love to hear from you: info@trovador.eu

title: Taskin Stash V5 - Master Your Gadgets
description: Jumble-Free jetting is here. Keep all those dongles, cables and connectors under control.
allParagraphs: Jumble-Free jetting is here. Keep all those dongles, cables and connectors under control.

Taskin is a young startup based in San Francisco that loves travel and stylish gear. This is our 11th campaign here on Indiegogo. We have shipped thousands of products to backers in over 110 countries.
We are thrilled to introduce you to our latest creations.
We have shipped 1000s for Stashes to satisfied customers and backers around the world. And now we are thrilled to introduce you to its newly upgraded version, the Stash Gen 5.
Gen 5 features many new features, premium quality material and multiple improvements to fit and finish.
Below are some of Stash's cool and innovative features:

Stash's unique design is meant to optimize storage and accessibility. One of its key features is the rigid stay-vertical mid section. Both sides provide options to store items of various shapes and sizes. The design also makes it easy to find what you need when you need it without having to fumble around.

Cables of types and lengths can be a real pain to store, not any more. Seven easily accessible long pockets make it for a convenient way to store them. Just loop it around your finger and insert it into one of these pockets.
A Loop For All Sizes

How does Stash securely fit all these odd shapes and sizes? Stash features a unique adjustable storage system that allows you to create custom loops for all your multi-sized gadgets. Everything will have a place that fits so your gear doesn't slash around inside your bag.

Ball-point pens, ink pens, sketch pens, permeant markers, marker pens, stylus we all carry some of these with us and they seemed to be programmed to get lost at the worst times. We have you covered, Stash's magnetic shelves is the perfect place to store them. Its flexible mesh will expand to hold your growing collection. It is designed to be easy to see into and find what you are looking for.
One needs a mouse when one needs a mouse.. a dedicated pocket to fit one of those and another of similar size that can fit an Apple power adapter or something similarly sized.

Carry around a batter pack for those just-in-case situations? Or a portable hard drive? Stash's large flat pockets are perfect for those.  The flat pocket completely collapses when not in use so you don't waste that space.

You require a stylish and practical carry-on that can adapt to your unique needs. As you prepare for your trip, it will help you optimize your packing choices, and while you're en route, it will enhance your comfort. Upon reaching your destination, it comes equipped with the accessories essential to make the most of your stay. We've designed the perfect system to ensure all of this becomes a reality.

Introducing a cutting-edge 4-wheel hybrid carry-on, equipped with Taskin's Cling-on system and optional accessories, crafting the most irresistible travel companion that will leave you wondering how you ever lived without it.
Taskin design principles are anchored in combining style and quality with innovative function. And the Taskin Denali delivers on all 3 of these fundamentals in spades.
Taskin's unique design allows you to attach accessories to the back of the Denali carry-on, effectively extending and adapting the carry-on to your needs.
An expandable full-featured backpack and a slim laptop sleeve are the first two accessories to ship with  the Denali Travel System.
Denali boasts exceptionally smooth, rubberized wheels at its base. The larger set at the aft makes shifting to roller-bag functionality a breeze.
Spacious top pocket offers ample room for travel documents, phone, adapters, 3-1-1 toiletry bags, and even a tablet.
Cast your gaze down Denali's front and note the lateral pocket, accessible from both sides and roomy enough for a glass case or even a small book.
A concealed water bottle sleeve accommodates even those super-tankers you've been hauling around lately. Helping to ensure hands-free hydration on even the longest trip.

The Denali carry-on features a 9 inch deep packing bay, cavernous for a carry-on that you can take onboard with you. It can easily hold six large Taskin packing cubes, or in combination with our other travel gear like roller toiletry bag or Stash electronics bag.
Peaking beneath Denali's top lid, a bonus compartment makes packing a folded jacket or even a lightly packed, extra-large Taskin cube a cinch.
Denali is constructed using premium waterproof materials including YKK AquaGuard® waterproof zippers with lockable sliders.

Well, it is a Taskin, so it what else would you expect? Our design principles are anchored in combining modern style, superior quality, and inventive functionality. Spoiler alert: This Taskin revels in all three.
Two large pockets in the front ensure quick access to everything you need.
Dedicated large and padded laptop section that can fit most 17" laptops (max size 40 X 30 X 1.5 cms).
The laptop section is accessible when the backpack is attached to the Denali carry-on using the Cling-On attachment system.
In addition to the external pockets, there are a lot of organization options on the inside as well.
Just having more pockets is obviously not enough, so we put in a lot of thought and experimentation into designing the most optimal configuration that will get you the most use out of these pockets.
Best of all, these pockets are all accessible when the backpack is attached to the Denali carry-on using the Cling-On attachment.
Go from an ultra-slim backpack to a full sized one using using the expansion zippers. The expansion zipper adds 10 liters of packing capacity in an instance. Perfect for that hiking or a day trip.
Planning for a long hike, or a crosstown stroll? Excellent idea, but your shoulders might not agree. Denali's built in, padded hip-belts will help take almost 80% of the strain off your shoulders.
Best of all it cleverly built into the bag and you don't need to remember to carry it around or worse lose it.

The backside features a luggage handle passthrough to easily secure the backpack to your luggage so you're ready to hit the runway fumble-free. This allows you to attach the laptop sleeve using the Cling-On system and the carry the backpack on the handle.

For work-only trips, the Denali laptop sleeve offers a slim yet equally stylish and practical alternative to the Denali backpack. Even for this seemingly straightforward product, we have ensured that it remains faithful to Taskin's commitment to excellence.

The Laptop Sleeve is versatile, allowing you to carry it either vertically or horizontally. The zippers are designed to open in both directions, and the two handles make it effortless to switch between modes.
US SHIPPING ONLY

The most stylish under seat carry-on in the market, is also the most practical, beauty and brains.

title: MarsPlanter-Indoor Hydroponics Planter & LED Light
description: Hydroponics|Ceramic Pot | LED Grow Light|Self-watering|Adjustable H|Timing Settings|Seed to Plant
allParagraphs: Hydroponics|Ceramic Pot | LED Grow Light|Self-watering|Adjustable H|Timing Settings|Seed to Plant
Introducing MarsPlanter - Hydroponics Redefined.

A Patented self-watering ceramic pot with LED plant lamp and timing settings ensure optimal yields with minimal resources. The future of planting is here, revolutionizing agriculture for sustainable, efficient, and high-yield crop growth.
Have you ever thought about planting on Mars?

Proven by scientists, hydroponic technology ensures optimal yields while minimizing resource consumption. It stands as the best way to enhance agricultural sustainability and improve food security. This groundbreaking solution maximizes crop growth, revolutionizing the field of agriculture.
On Earth, this means reduced land and water requirements, making it an environmentally friendly choice.

Today, everything you need for your plant is embodied in MarsPlanter, a hydroponic flower pot designed with your convenience in mind. MarsPlanter boasts comprehensive planting features, ensuring adequate sunlight and water supply, which allows plants to thrive in any environment.

MarsPlanter's patented ceramic pot boasts excellent water permeability and breathability, requiring no power sources, motors, or pumps. The tray, made of sturdy and porous ceramic, allows water to slowly diffuse and be retained in capillaries, providing plants with ample time to drink and reducing the frequency of watering.

Hydroponics involves soilless cultivation on a porous and absorbent ceramic tray, enabling direct water penetration without filtering out nutrients. This innovative approach nurtures robust plant growth without traditional soil or mud.

Have you ever witnessed the growth process of seeds? Yes, MarsPlanter can make seeds germinate without any soil. Just add water and turn on the light module. We recommend using mode one for warm and bright light to encourage seed germination. Once the seeds sprout, they will attach their roots to the surface texture.

Transparent window helps you know when to water, usually once a week. Adjust water amount based on plants' humidity needs, but maintain the water level as a minimum requirement. Hydroponics offers soilless and efficient plant cultivation.
With optimal water permeability and an auto-watering pot, the MarsPlanter takes care of all your plants' needs on a weekly basis, giving you more time to enjoy your harvest.

Ensuring plants thrive indoors all year round is a widely discussed topic, as most plants require ample sunlight. When unable to provide sufficient natural light, how can we ensure plants receive the necessary energy?
--Watering & Lighting are the biggest challenges for growing healthy plants Indoors.

With the ultimate solution for thriving plants, MarsPlanter is powered by 37 high-performance LED beams. This revolutionary device ensures optimal photosynthesis, with 3 adjustable light modes, it provides all the necessary plant wavelengths, allowing plants to thrive year-round. With it, you no longer need to worry about the challenges of indoor planting, allowing you to become an even better plant expert.
Mode 1: Warm yellow light benefits plant growth during the early germination stage, leading to better breeding results and stronger root development, enhancing nutrient absorption.

Mode 2: The combination of red and blue lights creates visible purple light, which enhances plant color and aroma. Purple or red plants exposed to this light can accumulate anthocyanins, making their colors more vibrant and promoting fruit yield.
Mode 3: The white, red, and blue light combination closely resembles sunlight (7-color spectrum), providing energy and promoting photosynthesis for all plants' daily light needs.
The lamp bead solution is provided by Sanan Optoelectronics Co

Different light colors serve different purposes, maximizing plant photosynthesis and growth. Remember, plant lights do not need to be on 24/7; giving plants proper rest during the night is a good idea.
The MarsPlanter is available in three vibrant colors (Coral White, Sea Green, Funky Orange) to match your personality.

The MarsPlanter's LED Grow Light connects to the flowerpot through an adjustable telescopic rod, allowing plants to grow vigorously under perfect LED illumination without any hindrance. With a 24cm（9.4in） expandable space, it rivals any existing seed pot on the market. You can easily adjust the height to accommodate various plant types, providing ample growth space and a wider lighting angle for lush leaf development.
"Hey! Your LED light module is blocking my adorable little one." But don't worry, the grow light can rotate 360 degrees! This way, you can easily take care of your lovely plants.

As we mentioned earlier, your beloved plants don't need sunlight 24/7; they also need rest at night. That's why MarsPlanter offers a thoughtful timing function that can be set for 3H, 9H, or 12H to turn off. This ensures your plants receive proper light without risking leaf burns.
MarsPlanter can be easily installed with Velcro, Magnetic, or Wall Mount. This means you can place it wherever you want.
Velcro installation effect
Magnet installation effect

MarsPlanter will help you take the first step into the wonderful world of plant cultivation. With simple operation, affordable price, and excellent user experience, it ensures your plant journey starts with success.
This planter is perfect for all kinds of plants, including aromatic basil and mint, creating a refreshing atmosphere and a sense of well-being.
Grow fresh herbs like thyme, oregano, and rosemary effortlessly with the MarsPlanter. Elevate your culinary creations today!
Plants have always been the best way to relax. Gazing at plants helps reduce eye fatigue, and feeling their presence can boost our positivity and energy levels in life.
-- More fun in planting awaits you to unlock.
For Stretch Goal, from Indiegogo, we provide the Pot Gripper x1.
and the Organic Coir Brick x1.
The Size

At MarsPlanter, we believe in cultivating a greener future for all. Inspired by our deep passion for sustainable agriculture and a desire to bring nature into every home, we embarked on a mission to create the ultimate hydroponics growing planter.
“May SpaceX bring us to Mars next year? and we are going to plant on it with MarsPlanter.” --Dara Zhu

Driven by innovation and fueled by our love for plants, we crafted the MarsPlanter to be a testament to modern gardening technology. With our state-of-the-art hydroponic system and patented pure nature ceramic ware, we revolutionize the way we nurture plants, optimizing their growth potential while conserving precious resources.

Our goal is simple yet profound – to empower individuals to become self-sufficient, to reconnect with nature, and to create a sustainable food ecosystem.
MarsPlanter Model Design

We invite you to join us on this remarkable journey as we transform homes into flourishing green spaces and inspire a profound love for gardening. Welcome to MarsPlanter, where the future of gardening begins.
Promoted By
Risk and Challenge

MarsPlanter's first Kickstarter campaign builds upon 5+ years of experience in design, testing, manufacturing, and global product shipping. Rigorous testing ensures top-notch quality, with customer satisfaction as our utmost priority for handling unexpected issues. We are fully aware that unexpected issues may arise, but rest assured, customer satisfaction remains our utmost priority, and we tackle any hurdles with dedication. We aim to deliver MarsPlanter on time, despite possible delays from global port backlogs, by partnering with reliable manufacturers. In the event that we encounter any production issues, we promise to maintain complete transparency, keeping you informed at every step of the process. At MarsPlanter, we believe in building a trusting relationship with our backers, and open communication is central to our values. With your support, we are confident in delivering a remarkable product that exceeds expectations and contributes positively to our environment.

title: iGulu S1: The Ultimate Beer Brewer For Everyone
description: One-Tap Easy Brew丨Chill & Pour on Demand丨Brew Unlimited Beer, Kombucha, Cider & Mead丨Easy Clean-up
allParagraphs: One-Tap Easy Brew丨Chill & Pour on Demand丨Brew Unlimited Beer, Kombucha, Cider & Mead丨Easy Clean-up

A game-changer for beer lovers, the iGulu S1 is a smart home brewing appliance that combines fermentation, cooling, and dispensing in one unit. Enjoy hassle-free home-brewed beer with 1-gallon kegs of professional quality. Brew in 3 simple steps and enjoy perfectly chilled, carbonated fresh beer right after brewing. Unlock endless flavor possibilities with the iGulu S1.
Whether you're brewing non-alcoholic or alcoholic beverages, iGulu has you covered. Explore a variety of global beers and other fermented beverages with iGulu S1 to satisfy diverse tastes.
*The temperature range is 37.4°F-53.6°F (3°C-12°C). The actual performance may be affected by ambient temperature, and the lowest temperature may not be achieved under high-temperature conditions.
Utilizing iGulu's FermControl 2.0 technology, the iGulu S1 ensures precise control of pressure and temperature, allowing you to brew a wide variety of beverages with limitless creativity and ease.

This optimizes your beer's flavor and quality through precise PID fermentation control, offering a broad temperature range of 37.4-86°F to accommodate various brewing needs and create the perfect environment for multiple yeast strains.
*Brewing beer typically takes 1-2 weeks, with different beer types requiring varying brewing times.

With iGulu S1's automatic pressure adjustment and triple safety lock, brewing becomes safer and more convenient. Constant-pressure fermentation eliminates secondary fermentation, improving efficiency and maximizing yeast activity. The result? A beer with a stable flavor profile and quality, every time.
The Genesis of iGulu

Founded in 2015, iGulu isn't just about an automated home brewery system; it's about igniting a passion for craft beer that's accessible to everyone, from seasoned brewers to novices. We've designed a smart, sleek system that guides you through each step with ease and innovation.

In 2016, we launched our first crowdfunding campaign. With an original crowdfunding goal of $100,000, we were amazed when the home brewing community surpassed it by $1,100,000! This support not only funded our project but also validated our vision of making home brewing more accessible and enjoyable. The funds are an investment in a brewing movement that values quality, creativity, and community.
Transparency First : We prioritized transparency with over 100 updates to our backers, ensuring trust and accountability.
Overcoming Challenges : We faced unexpected hurdles post-assembly but remained committed to quality, refining our processes to meet high standards.
Strategic Pivot : Profits from our commercial machines funded the development of our home-use machine, underscoring our dedication to making home brewing accessible globally.

CEO's Commitment : David Zhang, our CEO, personally delivered the first iGulu F1 units to Kickstarter backers in the US, highlighting his dedication and the importance of building personal relationships with our supporters.

In January 2024, we marked a pivotal moment with the rollout of smart brewing devices, turning our vision into reality. This milestone represents the strength and commitment of the iGulu team and the realization of a shared dream among craft beer enthusiasts.
Looking Back and Moving Forward

Reflecting on iGulu's journey, we see that the challenges, learning experiences, and triumphs have shaped our path and fostered a dynamic community. Our adventure continues, promising more innovation, collaboration, and exceptional beer.
Join the Brewing Revolution

We invite beer lovers and home brewers to join our vibrant community. It's about more than brewing beer; it's about embracing innovation, creativity, and the joy of creating something special. Share your stories, recipes, and tips as we push the boundaries of home brewing together. Join us, and let's redefine home brewing where every sip embodies the spirit of collaboration and innovation.

Observing and recording the microscopic world has long been reserved for scientists. Whether for scientific pursuit or pure curiosity, each discovery through a microscopic lens reveals the complex details of life, showing us how even the smallest structures can deepen our understanding of the world.

title: The Ultimate Magnetic Quick-Release Flashlight
description: Pop-to-Light. Magnetic Base. Rechargeable. White/Red/UV LED Options. Crafted in Brass or Titanium.
allParagraphs: Pop-to-Light. Magnetic Base. Rechargeable. White/Red/UV LED Options. Crafted in Brass or Titanium.

Hey Indiegogo! We're YSMART, unveiling MQ3X—the crown jewel of our revolutionary pop-to-light series. Built on the success of six flashlight campaigns with over 15,000 backers, MQ3X redefines the EDC flashlight.
We've crafted what we believe to be the pinnacle of keychain flashlights. It embodies everything we've ever dreamed of in a micro flashlight. We're confident you'll agree!
The 'Pop-to-Light' feature makes it incredibly easy to get powerful light fast—just when you need it. It's the ultimate convenience for those urgent, gotta-see-now moments.
Sometimes, you just need a strong light and fast. YSMART MQ3X, is your go-to EDC flashlight that's always ready for action. It's simple: just pop it off its base to instantly light up anything.
No fumbling in the dark, no struggling with twist mechanisms. Our magnetic quick-release design means instant illumination the moment you need it.
Just pull it off your keychain, and voilà, light instantly. Take it anywhere, light up anything—it’s that easy.
Experience swift and dependable charging with the MQ3X's USB Type-C port, designed for quick power-ups via your computer or power bank. Charging times are impressively short—less than one hour.
Powered by a rechargeable 10180 Li-Ion battery (included), the MQ3X can run for up to eight hours on a single charge, allowing you to rely less on battery purchases and more on your adventures.

Exceptionally compact, this flashlight slides seamlessly into any pocket or can be clipped onto your keychain. Perfect for on-the-go lighting, it's an essential tool for both bustling city streets and remote trails.

The MQ3X offers versatile lighting with three distinct LED options, each flashlight featuring one specific LED. Pick the perfect beam for your needs: white light for brightness, red light for night vision, or UV light for security and forensic applications. Choose the MQ3X LED that best fits your needs. If you want more light colors, you can always grab additional MQ3X flashlights.
Secure your YSMART MQ3X with confidence. Equipped with a robust magnet that delivers strong pulling force, this flashlight stays firmly in place, no matter where you attach it.

The magnetic base extends the functionality of the MQ3X beyond traditional use. Easily attach it to any ferrous metal surface for hands-free lighting during repairs, nighttime adventures, or when you need both hands for the task at hand.

Built to last, YSMART MQ3X melds rugged durability with sleek design in signature brass or ultra-tough titanium. Offering robust protection and stylish aesthetics, this flashlight is virtually indestructible, ready for daily use and extreme adventures alike.
Building on the success of six previous generations, we've enhanced the MQ3X's magnetic structure to double-locking and upgraded the pin material for even greater security and durability.

Upgrade your everyday carry with the MQ3X Titanium Deluxe—a premium version exclusively for our titanium models. Simply pledge for the titanium standard version for now and opt for the Deluxe upgrade in the Add-ons.

We created the original pop-to-light YSMART flashlight as a rugged, tiny EDC flashlight that you could take with you for any use anywhere. We made it because we wanted a better way to always have a flashlight available, something we could add to our EDC and backcountry kit.

The widespread use of digital screens, unhealthy eye habits, lack of physical activity, environmental pollution, the chemical ingredients in cosmetics and skincare products, and the pressures of daily life all pose challenges to our skin and eyes. In response to these issues, we have introduced the powerful Foodmagic 670nm Red Light Therapy Device, also known as the Foodmagic Vision Power Bank. This device is not only designed to improve vision and beauty care but can also be used to treat prickly heat, frostbite, small wounds, and more, thanks to the unique benefits of 670nm red light. It can be used year-round for daily use, effortlessly handling everything even in summer and winter!

This innovative product integrates the dual functions of "vision protection + beauty and skin care" by utilizing 670nm red light irradiation to stimulate cell growth and accelerate metabolism. This takes you to a new level of vision and skin care.

Red light has the ability to "charge" the mitochondria of retinal photoreceptor cells, reduce the apoptosis rate of age-related cells, and improve the function of photoreceptor cells. Additionally, it can relax the ciliary muscles of the eyes, relieve eye soreness, promote blood circulation around the eyes, enhance retinal cell metabolism, and help restore optimal vision.

This technology has been extensively researched, validated, and widely recognized for its positive effects on preventing myopia in teenagers and slowing down visual decline in middle-aged and elderly individuals. Its vision protection effect is significantly superior to that of rest, massage, and hot compress therapies.

Red light irradiation has been shown to enhance cell metabolism, increase glycogen content, promote protein synthesis and adenosine triphosphate decomposition, as well as stimulate cell regeneration and blood circulation within blood vessels. This makes it great for skincare, such as beauty care, addressing issues like prickly heat, frostbite, and small wounds, and more!

Foodmagic abandons the common red light wave bands including 650nm and 640nm wavelengths in the past. Based on the latest international research theory, the more targeted 670nm red light is selected to repair cells in depth, so as to prevent failing eyesight, alleviate eye fatigue and improve the periocular skin.

The Foodmagic boasts a diffuse reflection plate as one of its key features. This special structural design greatly improves the light receiving uniformity, improves the poor efficacy caused by uneven light radiation density, and greatly enhances the use effect.

It is well established that light of varying wavelengths exhibits distinct absorption peaks in cells. Specifically, the 670nm red light wavelength closely aligns with the absorption peak of cytochrome c oxidase, a critical enzyme in the cell respiratory chain. Consequently, cells more readily absorb 670nm red light, leading to more pronounced biological effects.

Compared to 650nm and 640nm red light, 670nm red light exhibits superior skin and tissue permeability. Its ability to penetrate deeper into ocular and cutaneous tissues allows for direct targeting of specific cells, resulting in more precise and effective therapeutic outcomes.

Recent scientific research has demonstrated that the 670nm red light wavelength possesses distinct advantages in enhancing cellular vitality, improving blood circulation, reducing oxidative stress, and alleviating eye fatigue. These findings provide compelling evidence for our selection of 670nm red light as a more precise phototherapy wavelength.

The Foodmagic exit pupil distance is 40cm/15.76inch, which is comparable to the distance at which one typically reads books, uses mobile phones, and operates computers. This distance is more in line with natural visual habits. Use it at 40cm/15.76inch from your eyes can accurately irradiate the retina and surrounding tissues of the eyes with red light.

During skincare sessions, place the transparent cover in contact with the skin to achieve the best results. This cover, made of safe transparent material, allows the red light emitted by Foodmagic's LED beads to penetrate harmlessly, delivering the best possible outcomes.

During the product development process, we have conducted nearly 300 continuous tests and actively sought international certifications to meet safety standards for multiple countries, including FCC, UL, CE, RoHS, IC, GB4706.1, PSE, METI, UN38.3, and more.

title: Coach for SketchList 3D
description: SketchList Coach answers your questions in SketchList in real time, right when you need them.
allParagraphs: SketchList Coach answers your questions in SketchList in real time, right when you need them.
Woodwork Design Software: Smarter. Better. Easier. SketchList 3D + Coach
Woodworking is both creative and precise, but traditional design tools weren't designed to be used the way real woodworkers think. SketchList 3D changed that.
And now, with Coach, we're taking it even further.
SketchList 3D: Built for Woodworking
SketchList 3D is a design platform explicitly created for custom cabinetry, furniture, and woodwork.
Whether you're creating one more storage piece or building 20 kitchens, SketchList lets you work faster, think visually, and build accurately.
The Challenge: Getting Help When You Need It
Even the best tools have a learning curve. And the best woodworkers make poor assumptions about how things should work.
How do you learn? Reading manuals is slow. Forums are just opinions of others. YouTube videos are hit or miss. And waiting for email support? Good luck.
Software users spend 19% of their time searching for and gathering information. That's nearly 1 day per week lost to hunting down answers. Assuming you work a five-day week.
The Solution: Instant Intelligent Help Built add-on for SketchList 3D

SketchList 3D Coach is your inline helper assistant. It provides immediate, context-aware support so you can get answers the moment you need them, without leaving your workflow.   You type in [or perhaps speak] your question or problem, and Coach answers immediately.
With Coach, You Can:
Ask about any feature—in your own words—and get a clear, accurate response.
Learn as you work with short, step-by-step instructions or links to specific times in YouTube videos that address your question.
Skip the user manual and avoid digging through long training videos. Just ask a question.
Why Coach Outperforms Traditional Training

Most help systems are rigid and one-size-fits-all. The information provided is linear.   But woodworking design isn't static—it's dynamic, creative, and often a deadline-driven task. Coach is flexible and dynamic, adapting to how you think and work in the shop.

We seek support to expedite the delivery of this new and innovative product. We have already invested a significant amount of time and effort, and we have a solid foundation in place. What remains are the user interface design and packaging for shipment.
Years ago, the SketchList community helped fund the development of our Version 5. This has become a leader in custom design software, specifically designed for woodworkers. It's time to do it again.
This offering appeals to existing SketchList users and those transitioning to SketchList for their design work.
If you have SketchList, please consider helping to fund the Coach add-on.    When you support Coach, you're not just funding development—you're unlocking real value.
Choose Your Access Level of Support
If you already have SketchList 3D, any version, you have two opportunities available to you.
You can support the effort with a $100 payment for the Coach-only add-on.
You can upgrade to a full SketchList V5 Pro with Coach with the other levels.
If you haven't used SketchList but want to. You can choose the full Pro version, plus Coach, a comprehensive system for woodworking design. The deal cannot be beat.
$100 Coach add-on only. You should already have SketchList 3D and have a maintenance plan in place.

$350 – 2-Year Plan
Special Upgrade Offer for Older Versions
If you're using SketchList Hobby or a version older than V5, think about this.
All of these packages include no-cost support.
What You're Supporting

We've built SketchList 3D with community feedback and support since day one.
Now we're asking for your help to launch Coach—our most ambitious tool yet.
Get More from the Software You Use
Whether you're new to SketchList or already building with it every week, Coach helps you move faster, solve problems, and stay focused.
Please support the rollout of Coach.
